Ingredients: BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, Lemon Juice, Pineapple Gomme Syrup*,  Fee Bros Lemon Bitters, Old Vine Zin

Then you're gonna make a sugar syrup with 2 parts sugar, 1 part water (4 cups water, 2 cups white granulated sugar) in the same manner over high heat until it mixes, and then add the gum syrup to the mix until everything dissolves and what you're left with is a thick gummy syrup that resembles a whole lot of baby batter. Then cut up 1.5 cups of pineapple chunks, put in mason jar, and pour the gum syrup over it and let it sit in the refrigerator over night. A few hours would work also if you don't have that much time. However, the more time, the more pineapple infusion takes place. When it's ready, strain into another mason jar or bottle, and it's ready to go.

Ingredients: Jasmine Tea/Rice-Infused Junipero Gin*,  Leopold Bros. Sour Apple Liqueur,  Lime,  House-made Honey Syrup**,  Lo-Fi Gentian Amaro

Garnish with edible flower.  *Jasmine Tea/Rice-Infused Junipero Gin: -- 1 bottle (750ml) Junípero gin -- .5 cup Jasmine Tea -- .5 cup Jasmine Rice (wash rice to eliminate starch)  Sous Vide Version: Wash the jasmine rice to clean out the starch. Fill container with hot water. Set sous vide at 52c. Add vacuum seal bag with jasmine tea/rice in bath. Let sit in bath for 45 minutes. Take the bag out of bath and sit it in ice bath for 15 minutes. Open bag and fine strain back into bottle.  Infusion Version: Wash the jasmine rice to clean out the starch. In a cambro/mason jar, add Junípero gin and jasmine tea and rice. Let infuse for 24 hours. Fine strain into bottle.  **House-made Honey Syrup:   Put equal parts of honey (10 oz) and water (10 oz) in a saucepan. Boil, then turn down to a simmer and stir until the honey is completely dissolved.

Preparation: Add gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and liqueur de violette to a collins glass filled with ice. Add tonic water; stir to combine. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Dry Curacao,  Bourbon Rye,  Lemon Juice
Preparation: Add ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously strain over fresh ice. Garnish with lemon peel to fit in glass and 1 dash of Abbott's Aromatic Bitters. Optional sugar rim.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Lemon juice,  Simple syrup, Club soda
Preparation: Add ingredients to a mixing glass except club soda. Shake over ice, strain over ice into a collins glass, top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge and candied ginger on a pick.

Ingredients: Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey,  Lemon Juice, Cold-pressed Apple Cider, Hot Water,  Honey-Ginger Syrup*, Ghost-Pepper-Infused Campari**, Cinnamon Tincture***
Preparation: Add ingredients to a mug and stir.  *Honey-Ginger Syrup: Combine 1 part ginger with 2 parts honey and 1 cup of water and boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 mins. Strain and discard solids.  **Ghost-Pepper-Infused Campari: Soak 1 ghost pepper in a 16 oz. bottle of Campari for up to 24 hrs (reduce infusion time to reduce heat).  ***Cinnamon Tincture: Soak 3 cinnamon sticks in 16 oz. of any neutral grain alcohol that is high proof (regular 80-proof vodka is great) for up to 14 days. Strain and discard the sticks.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, East Imperial Superior Tonic ,   Assorted Complementing Botanicals*
Preparation: Add Junipero Gin and botanicals first. Add ice and follow with a bold tonic. Top with additional botanicals/garnish for presentation.  *Assorted Complementing Botanicals: Orange, Star Anise, Rose Petals, Italian Juniper

Ingredients: BarSol Selecto Acholado Pisco,  Fresh Lime Juice, Angostura Bitters,  top Ginger Ale
Preparation: Add pisco and lime juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Pour ginger ale into the glass to top. Add 2-3 drops of bitters. Garnish with lime wheel.

Ingredients: Briottet Creme de Cassis, Chilled Dry Champagne
Preparation: Add room temperature Creme de Cassis to the glass first, followed by the Champagne.

Ingredients: Briottet Creme de Cassis, Chilled Dry White Wine
Preparation: Add room temperature Creme de Cassis to the glass first, followed by the wine.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, Citrus Agave Blend, Soda Water
Preparation: Add soda to bucket first, then add spirits and mixers. Top with ice and garnish.

Ingredients: Chateau de Montifaud Cognac VSOP, Plymouth Gin, Contratto Bianco Vermouth, Regans' Orange Bitters No. 6, Club Soda
Preparation: Add spirits and bitters to collins glass. Add large ice cubes and fill with club soda. Garnish with orange peel (or lemon peel).

Ingredients: Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, Prosecco
Preparation: Add the Cherry Liqueur to a flute, top with Prosecco, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: H by HINE, House Ginger Beer,  Lime juice,  Simple syrup,  John D. Taylor's Velvet Falernum, 3  Cucumber wheels, 8  Mint leaves, 1  Mint sprig
Preparation: Add the cucumber, mint and simple syrup to a mixing glass and muddle. Add everything else, then shake with ice and strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a mint sprig poking through a cucumber wheel.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Lime juice , Ginger beer
Preparation: Add vodka and lime juice to drinking glass, add ice, and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime.

Ingredients: Pear Brandy, Dry Vermouth,  Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc,  Dolin Genepy
Preparation: Barrel aged for 5 months in a used bourbon barrel.  Stir with ice and strain into a small coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine),  Leopold Bros. Bitter,  Velvet Falernum,   Red Hawaiian Salt
Preparation: Barrel aged in a used bourbon barrel that previously held a cocktail containing Hine Cognac and Luxardo Bitter.  Stir with ice and strain into a small coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila,  F. Meyer Mirabelle (Yellow Plum),  Fino Sherry,  The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue, Horchata,  Simple Syrup (2:1),  Lime Juice
Preparation: Blend with ice.

Ingredients: Hot Water, Glenrothes, King's Ginger Liqueur, Honey
Preparation: Boil water in a tea kettle.   Squeeze lemon slice into the mug. Insert whole cloves into the lemon slice and drop it into the mug.

Ingredients: 1 cube Brown Sugar, soaked in Peychaud's Bitters,  Pink Pigeon Rum,  fill Champagne
Preparation: Brown sugar cube soaked in Peychaud’s Bitters. Put soaked sugar cube in glass first. Pour .75 oz Pink Pigeon rum into flute over sugar cube. Fill remainder of the glass with champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.

Ingredients: Avuá Prata Cachaça, Bacardi Superior Rum, Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Rose, Lime Juice, Cannella Cinnamon Cordial, Simple Syrup
Preparation: Build & Stir. Hoshizaki Ice.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco,  London Dry Gin,  Elderflower Liqueur, Citric Acid, Orange Flower Water, Topo Chico Mineral Water
Preparation: Build all ingredients except for the Topo Chico in a wine glass. Fill the glass with cubed ice then top with Topo Chico by pouring it down a barspoon to incorporate. Zest the top with orange and place it in the glass. Add edible flowers for aroma and aesthetic.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, C. Drouin Calvados Selection, Vermouth del Professore, Angostura Bitters, St. George Absinthe
Preparation: Build all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with fresh fennel flowers.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Junipero Gin,  Dry Vermouth,  Curacao, Rhubarb Bitters
Preparation: Build all ingredients in a mixing glass. Stir with ice and strain into coupe. Garnish with grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: Bacardi Superior Rum, Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc, Lemon Juice, Velvet Falernum
Preparation: Build all ingredients in a punch bowl and add ice, stir gently. Garnish with seasonal fruit and citrus wheels.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial,  King's Ginger Liqueur, Pineapple Juice,  Simple Syrup, Coconut Water, 1 fill Soda Water
Preparation: Build all into highball. Fill with ice. Top with soda water. Place pineapple leaf vertically in the glass.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Real Cranberry Juice,  Luxardo Fernet,  Lime juice, Puer Black Tea
Preparation: Build and pour in punch bowl over large ice block.

Ingredients: oz Pink Pigeon Rum,  oz St. Germaine Elderflower Liqueur,  oz Lemon ,  oz Vanilla Syrup,  oz Prosecco
Preparation: Build and serve in a champagne flute.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Lillet Blanc, No.3 London Dry Gin,  Rose Wine
Preparation: Build cocktail in glass, add ice and stir. Garnish with rose petal.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Cranberry Juice, Fever-Tree Lemonade
Preparation: Build in a glass over ice. Add lemon wheels and strawberries. Finish with a splash of fresh lemon or top up with some sparkling wine. This drink can also be made in jugs or punch bowls.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Agave Syrup, Watermelon, 2  Lemon Juice,  top Ginger Beer
Preparation: Build in a large pitcher or punchbowl. Combine Pink Pigeon Rum, juice from 2 lemons and agave. Blend 7 oz. of fresh watermelon in a blender and puree to mixture. Add a generous amount of ice and stir. Top with ginger beer. Ladle or pour into coupe glasses.

Ingredients: Wild Turkey 101 Bourbon,  Strawberry, Black Pepper Balsamic Shrub*,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, Fever-Tree Tonic Water
Preparation: Build in a mixing glass and add ice. Slowly pour back and forth between two tins, about 4-6 times. Then dump the whole cocktail into a Fizz or Collins glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco,  Gin,  Clarified Milk*, Orange Bitters, Vanilla
Preparation: Build in a mixing glass. Add ice. Stir to dilute. Strain into a Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with an orange twist.  *Clarified Milk: -- 1 C Whole Milk -- .5 oz Lemon Juice  Heat milk to just before a simmer, then add lemon juice. Lightly stir to break the solid from the whey. Let chill for 5 mins to allow the solids to properly separate. Coffee strain twice for clarity.

Ingredients: BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Fresh Lime Juice,  Agave Nectar, Cranberry Bitters, Ginger Beer
Preparation: Build in an ice filled 14 oz beer glass, add BarSol Pisco, Ginger Liqueur, fresh lime juice, and agave nectar. Roll into a Boston shaker and shake to mix, place cranberry bitters on top, add ginger beer and garnish with a wedge of fresh lime.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Build in an old fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with orange peel.

Ingredients: Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon,  Luxardo Bitter,  Cold Blue Bottle Coffee,  Luxardo Anisette, Peychaud's Bitters
Preparation: Build in collins glass. Top with soda. Orange peel.

Ingredients: Tempus Fugit Alessio Vino Chinato, Fig-Infused C. Drouin Calvados Selection,  Lemon,  Simple Syrup
Preparation: Build in glass. Add crushed ice and swizzle. Top with more crushed ice. Dash pepita tincture on top for aromatics. Garnish with lemon wheel and dried fig.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Fever-Tree Bitter Lemon
Preparation: Build in ice-filled tall glass, garnish with a squeeze of lime.

Ingredients: English Harbour Rum 5 YO, Fresh Squeezed Pineapple Juice, Fresh Coconut Water
Preparation: Build in old fashioned glass over ice.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO,  15 YO Sherry, 2 dashes Dr. Adam's Boker's bitters,  Simple syrup
Preparation: Build in old fashioned glass, stir and serve over large ice cube.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO,  Rich Cane Syrup, Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters, Cinnamon Bitters
Preparation: Build in rocks glass. Use cylinder ice cube.

Ingredients: Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, Amer Picon, House Cola Syrup
Preparation: Build over ice in Old Fashioned glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Squeeze of Lime , Italian Sparkling Water
Preparation: Build over ice, stir lightly, and garnish with a lime twist and a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: Luxardo Aperitivo, Prosecco, Sparkling Water
Preparation: Build over ice, stir lightly, and garnish with an orange peel or slice and Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, Fever-Tree Indian Tonic, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Preparation: Build spirits in a tall glass over clear ice. Top with 4 oz tonic and garnish with a lemon twist curled into a flower if you're feeling fancy.

Ingredients: Luxardo Cherry Syrup (from jar of cherries), Vanilla Ice Cream,  top Soda Water
Preparation: Build syrup and ice cream in a lowball cocktail glass, and top with soda water. Serve with a metal straw, a spoon, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Campari, Martini & Rossi Sweet Vermouth
Preparation: Build the cocktail in a mixing glass. Stir for about 15 seconds and then strain over ice into a old fashioned glass.

Ingredients: Blended Scotch, King's Ginger Liqueur,  The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Orange,  Fresh Lemon Juice,  top Hot Water, Peychaud's Bitters
Preparation: Build then pour into a pre-heated Irish coffee glass or mug. Top with hot water. Garnish with the orange slice and add a dash of Peychaud's Bitters.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Junipero Gin,  LemonJuice,  Orgeat, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Chill coupe glass and garnish rim by coating the outer lip of the glass with a wedge of lemon and dipping into a shallow dish containing superfine white sugar. Place lemon strip neatly along side of sugared coupe. Combine all liquid ingredients into shaker; add ice and shake. Double strain into glass.

Ingredients: Montelobos Mezcal,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Fresh Lime Juice, Apple Cider,  Monin French Raspberry Syrup
Preparation: Chill cup and place a napkin around it. In the base of the cup put everything except the cider and the raspberry syrup and give a brief stir. Add some crushed ice. Stir vigorously. Top with crushed ice. Add cider. Pour raspberry syrup on top. Garnish with cinnamon quill as a stirrer, some small flowers, and a lime wheel.

Ingredients: Nikka Coffey Grain Whiskey,  Luxardo Bitter,  Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, Chocolate Bitters
Preparation: Chilled. Serve up or on the rocks.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Green Chartreuse,  Lime Juice,  Pineapple Juice
Preparation: Cold shake-strain into coupe and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Tempus Fugit Creme de Noyaux,  Orgeat,  Lemon,  Lime, Heavy Whipping Cream, 1  Egg White
Preparation: Combine all ingredients and shake thoroughly without ice for several minutes. Add ice, shake, and strain into a tall collins glass. Top with soda and garnish with an orange wheel.

Ingredients: Christmas Spirit,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Rose,  Tempus Fugit Gran Classico Bitter
Preparation: Combine all ingredients and stir with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into coupe glass and garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Graham's 20 Year Tawny Port,  Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or,  Velvet Falernum,  Benedictine
Preparation: Combine all ingredients and stir. Pour the mixture into a chilled Nick & Nora glass and garnish with the orange zest.

Ingredients: Christmas Spirit,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Lemon juice,  Honey syrup,  Egg white, Ale, Dale DeGroff's Pimento Aromatic Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients besides beer and bitters and dry shake without ice. Add ice and re-shake, double strain into a fizz glass and top with beer. Garnish with shaved nutmeg and 3 drops of bitters.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Maurin Quina,  Luxardo Bitter,  King's Ginger Liqueur
Preparation: Combine all ingredients besides blood orange into a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution (15-20 seconds). Pour into a small martini glass. Rub a thin slice of blood orange around the rim and place in drink.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Genevieve Gin,  Rich Wild Sage Honey Syrup, Angostura Bitters, Whiskey Barrel Aged Bitters,  Spring Water
Preparation: Combine all ingredients except Duke's Lemon garnish in mixing glass and stir. Pour into a rocks glass and garnish. Ice does not touch this drink.

Ingredients: Blanc Vermouth,  Lemon Juice,  Junipero Gin,  Giffard Pamplemousse,  House-made Yellow Shaw-treuse*,  Tonic, Celery Bitters, Coriander Tincture
Preparation: Combine all ingredients except for tonic. Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Top with the tonic and garnish with a fresh grapefruit peel.   *Substitute with Yellow Chartreuse Liqueur

Ingredients: Luxardo Aperitivo,  Round Pond Blood Orange Syrup,  Fresh Lemon Juice, Sparkling Wine
Preparation: Combine all ingredients except soda in a shaker with ice, shake to combine. Pour into a coupe glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Round Pond Meyer Lemon Syrup,  Fresh Lemon Juice, Soda water
Preparation: Combine all ingredients except soda in a shaker with ice, shake to combine. Pour over ice in a rocks glass and top with soda. Garnish with a Luxardo cherry.

Ingredients: Rhubarb Infused Gin*,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Lemon,  Simple Syrup , 1  Egg White,   Soda
Preparation: Combine all ingredients except soda in a tin and dry shake. Add ice and shake vigorously. Add soda into a collins glass and slowly strain the drink over it until it forms a head. Garnish with one rhubarb stalk.  *Rhubarb Infused Gin: 750 ml of gin with 3 chopped stalks of fresh rhubarb for 48 hours

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Elderflower Liqueur, Absinthe,  top Sparkling Wine
Preparation: Combine all ingredients except sparkling wine in a shaker. Add ice and shake until chilled through. Double strain into a champagne flute and garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: Old Forester Bourbon,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne,  Honey syrup (local honey cut 2:1 with water),  Lemon juice, 1  Egg white, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients except the bitters and dry shake. Add ice and shake again. Strain over fresh ice into a double old fashioned glass. Dash bitters over the top of the cocktail. Garnish with a dried peach and a piece of candied ginger.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka, Tomato Juice, Demitri's Bloody Mary Seasoning,  Fresh Lemon Juice
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a chilled mixing glass, rimmed with sea salt and stir. Add ice. Stir again to mix. Garnish with a cocktail shrimp, lemon zest, fresh ground pepper and a celery stalk.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur,  Pink Pigeon Rum,  Fresh-pressed Lemon Juice,  Snake Oil's House-made Sarsaparilla Syrup,  Carbonated Water, Snake Oil's House-made Pomegranate Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a Collins glass and stir. Garnish with a slice of ginger and lemon wheel.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka, Apricot brandy,  Dry vermouth,  Sweet vermouth
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a frozen mixing glass with hard ice and stir for 20 seconds. Strain into a frozen coupe glass.

Ingredients: Cocchi Americano, Karlsson's Gold Vodka, Club Soda
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a glass filled with ice and garnish with an orange twist.

Ingredients: BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine),  Lemon juice,  Luxardo Amaro Abano,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and add ice. Shake well and double strain and serve into a coupe.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka, Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,   Salt
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a sage leaf speared through two cocktail onions.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Lacuesta Blanco Vermouth,  Salers Gentiane Aperitif, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Germain-Robin Absinthe, Scrappy’s Lime Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and the edible flower of your choice.

Ingredients: Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey, BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), Luxardo Amaro Abano, Angostura bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and stir. Strain into a chilled coupe glass and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Apricot Eau-de-Vie,  Grenadine, Lemon Bitters, Absinthe
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, add ice and then stir. Strain into a Nick & Nora glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, Nori-Infused Sake*, Celery Bitters, Islay Scotch
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass, stir, and strain into a chilled Nick & Nora glass. Garnish with a picked cucumber ribbon.  *Nori-Infused Sake:  -- Ginjo Sake -- Nori Seaweed Sheet  Using an Oji Style Cold Brew Coffee Maker, drip Ginjo sake through a 0.5 gram of nori seaweed sheet that has been hand-shredded. It takes 3 hours to infuse a 750 ml bottle.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Bonal,  Luxardo Amaro Abano,  Nocino
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Stir until 2 oz water is diluted. Strain into a sherry or nosing glass. Flame and discard an orange peel. Drink deeply.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Bourbon Reserve, C. Drouin Pommeau de Normandie,  Chamomile Tea Syrup*,  Lemon Juice
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a mixing tin. Shake and strain into a collins glass full of crushed ice. Garnish with apple slices.  *Chamomile Tea Syrup:  -- 2 c water -- 1 c chamomile flower -- 1 c sugar Bring 1 cup water to boil. Add 1 cup chamomile flower and 1 more cup of water, bring back to a boil. Add 1 cup sugar, bring to boil.  Let it rest. When cool, the syrup is ready.

Ingredients: Gin,  Luxardo Apricot Liqueur,  Casoni 1814,  Dry Vermouth, Unfiltered Apple Juice, Fresh Lemon Juice,  Rich Simple Syrup (2:1), Jasmine Green Tea
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl, add a large chunk or block of ice, garnish with lemon wheels and apple slices. Serve when punch is chilled.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Fresh Lemon Juice,  Fresh Grapefruit Juice,  Simple Syrup,   Gin Barrel Aged Orange Bitters,   Fresh Basil Leaves
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake until proper dilution. Double strain into a chilled martini or coupe glass and garnish with 2 fresh basil leaves that have been lightly "spanked" to release aromatics.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Ouro Reserva Especial, Jalapeno-Orange Simple Syrup, Coconut Milk, Orange Flower Water, Mole Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin and shake vigorously. Double strain using a fine mesh strainer. Serve in a lager glass over ice.

Ingredients: Mezcal,  Don Ciccio & Figli Concerto,  Vanilla Marinade, Mole Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin and shake vigorously. Double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a highball glass.

Ingredients: Applejack, Amontillado Sherry,  Orgeat,  Fresh Lemon Juice, Tempus Fugit Creme de Noyaux
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin filled with crushed ice. Flash-shake and dump into a double old fashioned glass. Garnish.

Ingredients: BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine),  Penny Blue Mauritian Rum, Celery Shrub, House-made Tarragon Tincture
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker tin, add ice, and shake vigorously. Double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a highball glass.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Orange Liquor, House-made Spiced Pumpkin Puree,  Lemon Juice,  Ginger Syrup, 1  Egg White,  top Apple Cider
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaker, except the apple cider. Shake vigorously. Strain over ice. Top with apple cider. Garnish with shaved cinnamon and nutmeg.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Zirbenz Stone Pine,  Fresh Strawberry Juice w/ Xanthan Gum*,  Lemon Juice,  Simple Syrup
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaking tin and give it a short shake, five seconds. Strain into an old fashined glass with three medium sized ice cubes.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila,  Lemon Juice,  Small Hand Foods Pineapple Gum Syrup,  Vanilla Syrup*,  Coconut Cream**,  Egg White
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a shaking tin or mixing glass and vigorously shake without ice for 10 seconds. Add ice, and shake for another 8 seconds. Strain over larger ice cube or into a cocktail glass and add freshly grated cinnamon on top.  *Vanilla Syrup:  Split 1 vanilla pod lengthwise and scrape interior into a heavy sauce pan.  Add 2 c. raw sugar and 2 c. water. Bring to a simmer and reduce heat to low.  Cook for 5 mins and stir occasionally.  Remove from heat and keep unstrained for 24 hrs.  Strain through a cheese cloth and bottle. Keeps for 2 weeks.  **Coconut Cream: Combine 1 part Coco Lopez with 1 part rich coconut milk. Mix well.

Ingredients: Ca' Secco Sparkling, Luxardo Cherry Syrup
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a sparkling wine glass.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Luxardo Amaro Abano,  Luxardo Apricot Liqueur,  Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Perfect Puree Apricot*,  Lemon Juice
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum,  Fresh Lemon Juice,  Honey Syrup (1:1 honey & water), Pomegranate Juice, Rose Wine,   Cinnamon, grated,   Nutmeg, grated,   Cherries,   Strawberries,   Watermelon, cube
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in a wine glass, stir to mix. Add ice and enjoy.   Convert ounces to cups to make a larger pitcher for you and your guests.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, No.3 London Dry Gin, Orange Bitters, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into chilled cocktail coupe or Nick & Nora. Expel lemon peel over cocktail then place in glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco,  Bay Leaf Syrup*, Salt Tincture**
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in mixing glass. Stir and strain into Nick & Nora cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon zest and yerba mate tea sachet.  *Bay Leaf Syrup: -- 16 oz Water -- 12 Bay Leaves -- 1.5 C White Sugar  Bring water to boil with bay leaves. Lower heat to medium and simmer 15-20 mins. Stir in white sugar until dissolved, without bringing to a boil again. Remove from heat, let cool at room temperature. Remove bay leaves and enjoy.  **Salt Tincture: -- .5 C Salt -- 1 C Water -- 2 C 100p Vodka  Stir salt with water and vodka. Stir until dissolved. Strain out extra salt, if any.

Ingredients: Rhubarb Cucumber & Mint-Infused Junipero Gin,  Lemon Juice,  Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco,  Rhubarb Juice,  Grapefruit Juice,  Rhubarb Syrup, Fee Brothers Celery Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in Perlini sparkling cocktail shaker, shake and double strain into cocktail glass. (For home use, combine all ingredients, add ice shake 30 seconds and double strain into coupe, add splash of soda water.) Spray with atomized Old Tom Gin. Garnish with cucumber peel or candied rhubarb slice.  *Rhubarb Cucumber & Mint-Infused Junipero Gin: -- 1 bottle Junipero Gin -- 1 qt Chopped Rhubarb -- 1 Chopped Large English Cucumber -- .5 Bunch (15g) Fresh Mint (with stems)  Combine all ingredients in vacuum sealed bag and circulate at 53º for 2 hours. (For home use, combine all ingredients in plastic container and let rest for one week.)  *Rhubarb Syrup: Juice 1 qt (8-10 Stalks) Add to 1 qt of unbleached Cane sugar in saucepan and bring to simmer. Remove from heat, allow to cool and strain in Chinoise.

Ingredients: Luxardo Amaro Abano,  Lemon juice,  Simple syrup,  Egg white, Fee Bros Rhubarb bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in shaker. Dry shake for 10 seconds, add ice and shake for 30 seconds. Strain into small tumbler. Garnish with a sprinkle of grated nutmeg.

Ingredients: J.H. Cutter Whisky,  Averna Amaro,  Alvear PX Sherry, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in to a mixing glass and add ice.  Stir for about 10-15 seconds.  Strain in to a cocktail coupe or a glass of your choosing.  Garnish with an orange twist expressed over the top of the drink.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Maurin Quina,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Honey Jalapeño syrup, Orange juice,  Lemon juice, Soda water
Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a large punch bowl and add large ice cube/cubes. Garnish liberally with slice fruits.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Olive Juice, Dry Vermouth
Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO,  C. Drouin Pommeau de Normandie,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Black Walnut Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Stir for about 10 seconds and then strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. Garnish with skewered apple spheres and be thankful you're having a cocktail, and not having an apple shot off your head.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka, Junipero Gin,  Maurin Quina
Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice. Stir until proper dilution and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Simple syrup, Angostura bitters, Fee Brothers Gin Barrel Aged Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass and stir until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled bucket glass over a large ice cube and garnish with a dukes lemon and dukes grapefruit zest.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco,  BarSol Pisco,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Dry Vermouth
Preparation: Combine all ingredients into mixing glass. Add ice. Stir until very cold. Strain and fine strain to prevent ice chips in coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist entwined around a cinnamon stick.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Velvet Falernum,  Lime juice,  Pear Sage Foam, Prosecco
Preparation: Combine all ingredients with ice, shake, strain into martini glass, top with prosecco, garnish with sage.

Ingredients: Jack Daniel's,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, Fresh Lemon Juice,  Cane Sugar Syrup*, Angostura Orange Bitters
Preparation: Combine all ingredients, add ice, and shake. Double strain into an old fashioned glass and add fresh ice. Garnish with an orange slice (1/4 wheel) and Luxardo Cherry (both speared).  *0.25 - 0.50 oz Cane Sugar Syrup (to taste to allow variations in citrus flavor when batching)

Ingredients: Old Tom Gin,  Noilly Prat Ambre Vermouth,  Pineapple Juice,  Lime Juice,  Rich Simple (2:1),  Dry Sparkling Wine
Preparation: Combine all ingredients, minus the sparkling wine, into a tin. Shake and double strain into a flute glass. Top with a float of sparkling wine. Garnish with an edible flower petal.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Averna,  Honey, 1 whole Egg
Preparation: Combine all ingredients, shake for 20 seconds. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a snifter. Garnish with shaved nutmeg.

Ingredients: BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco,  El Tesoro Reposado Tequila,  Grüner Veltliner,  Lime,  Pineapple Gum, Sweet Marmalade
Preparation: Combine all ingredients. Shake and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Gran Duque d Alba Solera gran Reserva brandy,  Carpano Antica Vermouth,  Benedictine, 1 tincture Peychaud's Bitters, 1 tincture Angostura bitters
Preparation: Combine all liquid ingredients in a chilled mixing glass with cracked ice and stir for 20 seconds. Double strain the cocktail over a large cube placed in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils out of the twist. Also make sure to rub the entire rim of the glass with the twist before dropping it into the cocktail.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Esprit de June,  Fresh lemon juice,  Simple syrup
Preparation: Combine all liquid ingredients in a highball or Collins glass with ice. Stir lightly and garnish with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils out of the twist. Also make sure to rub the entire rim of the glass with the twist before dropping it into the cocktail.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Citadelle Gin, Orange Bitters,  Rose Poached Pear Syrup*, Topo Chico Mineral Water, Fever-Tree Sparkling Lemon
Preparation: Combine all liquids with exception of sodas, sir together. Strain into collins glass with singular large cube. Top with sodas. Garnish with sliver of poached pear from syrup (kept chilled).  *Rose Poached Pear Syrup: -- 1.5 C Rose (La Vielle Ferme or similar) -- 1.5 C Water  -- 2 C Sugar -- 1 Large Lemon -- 1 Half Orange -- 1 tsp Ground Ginger (not fresh) -- 1 tsp Vanilla -- 3-5 Whole Cloves  Combine Rose (La Vielle Ferme or similar), water, and sugar. Bring to a simmer. Add zest of lemon and an orange, ground ginger, vanilla, and cloves. Peel and halve pears, set gently into liquid. Keep just under a simmer for 15 mins. Remove from heat, let cool at least 20 mins. Pears will keep for 3 days refrigerated in syrup. The syrup itself will last longer.

Ingredients: C. Drouin Calvados Selection, Marrakesh Mint Tea, Prosecco, King's Ginger Liqueur, Lemon Juice, Velvet Falernum,  Dale DeGroff's Pimento Aromatic Bitters
Preparation: Combine all the ingredients except Prosecco. Add a large block of ice or large ice cubes and stir. Top with Prosecco. Garnish with orange wheels studded with cloves and float some mint sprigs in the bowl.

Ingredients: J.H. Cutter Whisky,  Moroccan Mint Tea (chilled)*,  The King's Ginger,  Lemon Juice,  Rich Honey Syrup**
Preparation: Combine all the ingredients in a mixing glass and stir for about 10 seconds. Strain in to an Old Fashioned glass or glass of your choosing. Add large ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wheel, mint sprigs and a blackberry.  *Moroccan Mint Tea (Numi Tea Brand): -- 1 Moroccan Mint Tea Bag -- 8 oz. Boiling Water   Combine the tea bag and the boiling water in a cup or a pot. Let steep for 5 minutes. Remove the tea bag and place the tea in the fridge to cool. Label and date the container. Will keep for 1 week.  **Rich Honey Syrup: -- 10 oz. Honey -- 5 oz. Hot Water  Combine both ingredients together in a container and stir until fully incorporated. Label and date the container. Will keep in the fridge for 2 weeks.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Luxardo Bitter, Kalani Coconut Liqueur, Angostura Bitters, Peychaud's Bitters
Preparation: Combine all the ingredients in an old-fashioned glass. Stir on the rocks. Garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, Fresh Lemon Juice,  Orange-scented Maple Syrup*, Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso
Preparation: Combine bourbon, lemon juice, and syrup in a shaker and add cold ice. Shake until chilled well (10-30 sec. depending on the quality of the ice). Strain into a collins glass and slowly pour the vermouth into the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.   *Orange-scented Maple Syrup: combine 6 oz. of grade B maple syrup, 6 oz. filtered water and the peel of 1 orange, with a minimum amount of pith in a non-reactive pan.  Simmer for 10 mins. Remove from heat and allow it to cool to room temp. before using.  Syrup will keep for 1 month if refrigerated.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Grapefruit Juice,  Lemon Juice, Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters,  to fill Anchor California Lager
Preparation: Combine Gin, Maraschino, juices, and bitters in an ice-filled mixing tin and shake for 20-30 seconds, or until well chilled. Strain over fresh ice into a Collins glass, top with the California Lager, and garnish with the grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: H by HINE (Brown Butter-Infused), King's Ginger Liqueur, Fee Brothers Black Walnut Bitters
Preparation: Combine H by HINE, King's Ginger Liqueur, and bitters over ice in a mixing glass. Stir until you reach proper dilution(15-20 seconds). Strain over a large ice rock in a bucket glass and garnish with Luxardo Cherries.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Lime Juice,  top Ginger Beer
Preparation: Combine Hophead Vodka, Kings Ginger, and lime juice in a Collins glass and fill with ice. Top with ginger beer. Stir. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Giffard Pamplemousse,  Lemon Juice, Orange Bitters,  top IPA
Preparation: Combine Hophead, lemon juice, Giffard Pamplemousse, honey syrup, and bitters in a shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled glass. Fill the glass with beer.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  King's Ginger Liqueur, Breckle's Brown Ale, Fresh Lemon Juice,  Honey Syrup,  Egg White, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Combine Hophead, lemon juice, King's Ginger, honey syrup, egg white, and bitters in a shaker and dry shake to emulsify egg whites. Add ice and shake vigorously until proper dilution. Strain into a chilled fizz glass. Empty ice out of shakers and fill shaker with ale to create a froth. Pour this froth over the drink and garnish with half an orange wheel.

Ingredients: HINE Rare VSOP,  Cynar,  Bywater Spice Mix*, Cold-Brew Coffee
Preparation: Combine ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Grate nutmeg on top.  *Bywater Spice Mix: Simple syrup infused with Vietnamese cinnamon, licorice root, and clove

Ingredients: Christmas Spirit, Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco,  Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), Fee Brother's Orange Bitters
Preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice. Strain and serve up with an orange twist.

Ingredients: Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky, Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters
Preparation: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a flamed orange peel.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Barr Hill Gin,  Falernum, Topo Chico Mineral Water, Lemon Bitters
Preparation: Combine ingredients in a pint glass, stir with ice to chill. Double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with mint and lemon wedge flag.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Oloroso Sherry,  Lemon Juice,  Winter Spice Brown Sugar Syrup*, Pineapple Juice
Preparation: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with nutmeg.  *Winter Spice Brown Sugar Syrup:  -- 2 qt Brown Sugar -- 2 qt Water -- 3 Tbsp Ground Ginger -- 3 Tbsp Ground Nutmeg -- 1 Tbsp Clove  Heat and simmer the below ingredients in a medium pot for 15 minutes. Strain with cheesecloth.

Ingredients: Old Tom Gin, Barolo Chinato, Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or
Preparation: Combine ingredients in an old fashioned glass filled with ice, stir to combine, and garnish with orange peel.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Reisetbauer Carrot Eau De Vie,  Genevieve Gin
Preparation: Combine ingredients in mixing glass, and stir with ice to dilution. Strain into a coupe cocktail glass. Garnish with a trimmed carrot ribbon.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Rooibus Tea (steeped and cooled), Mulled Cider (cooled),  Clover Honey Syrup,  Cava,   Angostura
Preparation: Combine ingredients into a chilled punch bowl, ice and dilute appropriately, garnish seasonally.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Miyagikyo Single Malt 12 YO,  Rare Wine Co. Charleston Sercial Madeira,  Fresh lime juice,  Small Hands Food orgeat
Preparation: Combine ingredients into a cocktail shaker.  Shake with ice vigorously for 10-15 seconds.  Strain into a chilled coupe glass. No garnish.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Lemon Juice,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Clover Honey Syrup
Preparation: Combine ingredients into a hot mug, top with hot water and garnish with a rough orange twist.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Pimms, Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, Fresh lime juice,  Simple syrup, 5 leaves Basil leaves
Preparation: Combine ingredients into a mixing glass, add ice and shake until properly diluted. Double strain into a glass over fresh ice, garnish with a cucumber wheel.

Ingredients: BenRiach Single Malt 12 YO, C. Drouin Calvados Selection, Luxardo Aperitivo
Preparation: Combine ingredients with ice in a mixing glass and stir. Strain over a large cube in a rocks glass and garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: Old Tom Gin, Cocchi Vermouth di Torino,  Luxardo Bitter, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Combine ingredients, stir until well chilled, and strain in to a cocktail glass. Serve with an orange twist.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Carpano Antica, Calisaya, The Bitter Truth Grapefruit Bitters
Preparation: Combine ingredients. Pour over big cube and stir. Add the grapefruit peel.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco,  Dolin Blanc, Prosecco
Preparation: Combine Luxardo Bitters and Dolin Blanc. Stir in mixing glass until chilled. Strain into flute. Top with prosecco. Zest with grapefruit. Garnish with long grapefruit zest.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco,  Castilian Tincture*,  BarSol Supremo Moste Verde Italia Pisco, Prosecco
Preparation: Combine Luxardo, BarSol, and tincture. Ice, stir, and strain into chilled coupe. Top with Prosecco. Gently set candied blood orange wheel (thinly sliced) garnish into drink and serve.  *Castillian Tincture: -- 750 ml Luxardo Grappa Euganea -- 20 g Sliced Blanched Almond -- 2 g Spanish Saffron -- 3 Sliced Madagascan Vanilla Beans -- 3 g Toasted Green Cardamom -- 4 Lemon Peels (pith removed) -- 2 Quartered Dried Pajarero Figs -- 2 Quartered Quartered Medjool Dates  Combine all ingredients, gently agitate twice daily for 14 days. Fine filter and store.  **Candied Blood Orange Wheels: -- 1 Blood Orange (sliced thin - approx. 10 slices/orange) -- .5 c Natural Sugar -- .25 c Water -- 2 Tbsp Corn Syrup  Combine sugar, water, and corn syrup in shallow saucepan. Slow simmer on low heat approx. 10 min. When thickened mixture begins to cling to sides of pan, add orange slices. Allow to simmer for 5 more min. and remove from hardening syrup. Place slices on parchment-lined oven rack. Air dry overnight, then bake 10 min. at 400°F (or dehydrate them).

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco,  Avua Cachaca Prata,  Broker's London Dry Gin,  Coconut Water, Toasted Coconut Tincture*, Almond Extract,  top Fever-Tree Mediterranean Tonic Water
Preparation: Combine Luxardo, cachaca, gin, coconut water, tincture and almond extract in a yari (mixing glass). Add ice. Stir for proper dilution (30-40 revolutions). Pour in collins glass over a clarified ice sphere. Top cocktail with Fever-Tree. Add 3 almond slices for garnish.  *Toasted Coconut Tincture: -- 4 oz (by weight) Semisweet Coconut Flakes -- High-Proof Neutral Grain Spirit (preferably Everclear)  Lightly toast semisweet coconut flakes. Put in a small mason jar. Fill jar with high-proof neutral grain spirit. Let sit for 3 days then strain off.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Junipero Gin, Apple Water*, Citric Acid Solution**
Preparation: Combine Luxardo, gin, apple water and citric acid solution into a shaker tin and shake to chill. Double strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a slice of Fuji apple lightly dusted with cinnamon.  *Apple Water: -- 1 Fuji Apple -- 2 c Water  Slice Fuji apple and combine with water. Vacuum seal and place in a sous-vide for 3-4 hrs at 130°F. Strain apples; water is ready for use.  **Citric Acid Solution: -- 1 ml gram Citric Acid -- 3 ml Water  Combine citric acid and water. Stir until dissolved.

Ingredients: D'aristi 10 YR Rum,  The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Blue,  Tempus Fugit Liqueur de Violettes, Lime Juice,  Tahitian Vanilla Bean Syrup, Ginger Beer, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Combine rum, curacao, violettes, and lime juice in a shaker, add ice and shake vigorously. Double strain into a chilled collins glass. Add fresh ice in the collins glass and top with chilled ginger beer. Float 2-3 dashes of Angostura Bitters on top and garnish with a grilled pineapple wedge on rim of glass, and two Luxardo Cherries speared through a toothpick, and edible orchid placed on top hanging from the rim.

Ingredients: Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky,  Absinthe, Hot coffee, Homemade Irish Cream
Preparation: Combine the coffee and whiskey in a preheated cup. Top with Irish cream and pour the absinthe over the back of a spoon to float. Garnish.

Ingredients: Light Rum,   Cointreau,  Lime Juice,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Simple Syrup (optional)
Preparation: Combine the ingredients in a Boston shaker or cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Strain the contents into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: Old Tom Gin, Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Lemon Juice
Preparation: Combine the ingredients. Shake and strain over ice. Lemon and/or cherry flag garnish.  Add soda water if you'd like to water it down.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka, Fresh grapefruit juice, Club soda, 1 tincture Grapefruit bitters
Preparation: Combine the Karlsson's Gold Vodka and grapefruit in a shaker with ice. Shake for 15 seconds and strain over fresh ice in an old-fashioned glass that has a salted rim. Top the cocktail with the club soda.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, Giffard Elderflower Liqueur, Lime Juice, Chili Tincture*, 6  Luxardo Maraschino Cherries
Preparation: Combine the lime, elderflower, tincture and cherries into a shaker tin. Muddle the cherries and then add the Junipero Gin. Shake with ice. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.  *Chili Tincture: -- Chiles (Habaneros or Bird’s eye Chiles recommended) -- Grain Alcohol or Vodka  Fill a small jar with stemmed hot chili peppers and cover with grain alcohol or high-proof vodka. Let soak for 3 days; strain.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Coca-Cola,  Lime Juice
Preparation: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the cola, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Ginger Beer,  Lime Juice
Preparation: Combine the Pink Pigeon, the ginger beer, and the lime juice, in a tall Collins glass full of ice cubes.

Ingredients: Domingo Perez Marin 'la Guita' Manzanilla Sherry,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Chartreuse ,  Juice of an Orange
Preparation: Combine these ingredients and roll gently over ice and strain into a martini glass. Top with pumpkin foam.

Ingredients: Absolut Vodka,  King's Ginger Liqueur, Fresh Lemon Juice , Ginger-Cinnamon Syrup*, Bar Keep Lavender Spice Bitters,  top Club Soda
Preparation: Combine vodka, ginger liqueur, lemon juice, ginger-cinnamon syrup and bitters in tins with ice and shake. Double strain into collins glass over fresh ice and top with club soda.  *Ginger-Cinnamon Syrup:  Equal parts demerara sugar, clover honey, fresh ginger juice, water. Combine demerara sugar and clover honey and top with boiling water. Stir to dissolve. Once cooled add fresh ginger juice and stir to mix.

Ingredients: 4 pieces Lime, 1-2 Tbsp Sugar, 1 Ypiòca
Preparation: Cut a lime in 4 pieces and put them in a glass. Add 1-2 tablespoons of sugar and crush with a pestle. Add Ypiòca. Fill with crushed ice. Stir well and enjoy!

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, 1 fill Champagne, Angostura bitters, Peach bitters, Luxardo Fernet
Preparation: Dash each bitter and the Fernet over sugar cube in base of Champagne glass so that the sugar is fully saturated with mixture. Add Pink Pigeon Rum and top with chilled Champagne. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum,  Briottet Creme de Framboise (Raspberry),  Lemon juice,  Simple syrup*
Preparation: Double strain into a martini glass.

Ingredients: C. Drouin Calvados Selection,  Orgeat,  Lemon Juice, Pear & Celery Puree, .5  Egg white
Preparation: Dry Shake (no ice), Wet Shake (with ice) & Double Strain.

Ingredients: Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, Rye Whiskey, Lemon Juice,  Angostura Bitters, 1  Egg White
Preparation: Dry shake all ingredients for 20-30 seconds. Then shake with ice. Double strain over fresh ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with wide lemon swath.

Ingredients: Bourbon,  Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira,  Demerara Syrup (1:1),  Lemon Juice, 1  Egg White
Preparation: Dry shake all ingredients. Hard shake with ice. Double strain into small pilsner glass. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  English Harbour Rum, 3 spoon Sugar, 1 whole Egg,  Milk,  Cream
Preparation: Dry shake and then shake with hand cracked ice. Serve in a goblet with grated nutmeg.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Green Chartreuse,  Sweetened Apple Cider, Baked Apple Bitters, 1 whole Egg
Preparation: Dry shake whole egg until emulsified. Then add Kold Draft ice and all ingredients except bitters and shake vigorously until cold. Strain into chilled royal coupette and garnish with apple wheels.

Ingredients: BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco,  Lime juice,  Hibiscus/rose syrup, 1  Egg white
Preparation: Dry shake, add ice and shake again. Strain into a coupe glass.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Jummai Ginjo Sake,  Luxardo Limoncello,  Dill Cordial,  Meyer Lemon Juice,  Yuzu Juice,  Fresh egg White
Preparation: Dry Shake, add ice and shake for 10 seconds. Double strain into a Copita Glass. Garnish with Dill.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Dry Oloroso Sherry, Grenadine, 1 whole Egg,   Vanilla-Salt Spray
Preparation: Dry shake, shake with cubed ice, double strain into chilled glass coated in vanilla-salt solution.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Campari, Lavender syrup, Lemon juice , Orange juice, Egg white
Preparation: Dry shake, shake with cubed ice, double strain into chilled glass.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  El Dorado 12 Year Old Rum,  Hamilton Black Jamaican Pot Still Rum,  Cinnamon Syrup,  Heavy Cream, St. Elizabeth Allspice Dram, 1 whole Egg,  top Founders Porter
Preparation: Dry shake, strain, top with porter.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Fresh orange juice, 1 Tbsp Luxardo Bitter, Milk powder (or cream)
Preparation: Dry shake, then serve old-fashioned glass with crushed ice. Drizzle Bitter on top to finish.

Ingredients: BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Peach Brandy,  Lemon juice,  Egg white
Preparation: Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain into flute or sour glass. Top with a Saison.  Zest orange over top and garnish with a star anise.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, 4  Pink Peppercorns, Fresh lemon juice, Gomme syrup, Egg white
Preparation: Dry shake, then shake with ice. Double strain over cubed ice.

Ingredients: C. Drouin Calvados Selection,  Lemon Juice,  Giffard Abricot du Roussillon,  Egg White
Preparation: Dry shake. Add ice, shake. Double strain into a frozen coupe glass. Garnish with lemon twist or dehydrated apple slice.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila,  Green Chartreuse,  Lime juice, Pineapple juice,  Jalapeño Syrup,  Egg White
Preparation: dryshake/shake/dblrocks  garnish jalapeño slice

Ingredients: Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, Apple Cider,  oz Heavy Cream,  oz Cinnamon
Preparation: Fill a 10-oz mug with boiling water. When the mug is hot, pour out the water and add the amaretto and cider. Top with a layer of cream. Grate fresh cinnamon on top as a garnish.

Ingredients: Mezcal, Reed's Premium Ginger Brew, Seedless Blackberry Jam, 1  Lime, juiced, 12  Mint Leaves, muddled
Preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add all ingredients except the garnish and shake well. Stain into a very chilled martini glass (martini glass should have a sugar rim on half of the glass) and top with a splash of ginger beer. Garnish with a mint leaf and orange peel. Right before serving drop in a chip of dry ice for the mist.

Ingredients: Mezcal,  Aperol,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Lime Juice
Preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add ingredients and shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass and garnish with the grapefruit twist.

Ingredients: Blended Lightly Aged Rum, Blended Aged Rum,  Lime Juice,  Luxardo Apricot Liqueur,  SC Demerara Syrup*,  Grapefruit Juice, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Fill a collins or highball glass with cracked or cubed ice. Add all the ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with cracked or cubed ice. Shake and strain into the glass.  *SC Demerara Syrup: -- 2 C Water -- 1 C Demerara Sugar -- 3 C Granulated Sugar  Bring water to boil in a saucepan over high heat. Add the demerara sugar and stir vigorously with a whisk (or use an immersion blender) until sugar is dissolved, about 1 minute (the water should become clear). Add granulated sugar and stir vigorously until dissolved, about 1 minute. Remove from heat and let cool.

Ingredients: Luxardo Cherry Syrup (from jar of cherries),  Fresh Lemon Juice (optional), Soda Water
Preparation: Fill a highball glass with ice, and build the syrup, lemon juice, and soda water. Stir, and garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Fill a mixing glass half full with ice. Add cognac, orgeat, and bitters. Stir well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist lemon peel over the drink and drop in as a garnish.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira,  Benedictine,  Orange juice,  Honey
Preparation: Fill a mug with very hot water to warm the glass up. Once the glass is hot, empty it and add all the liquid ingredients. Stir well until the honey is incorporated. Garnish with the clove studded orange peel and enjoy.

Ingredients: Prichard's Lincoln County Lightning,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Cinnamon-Candied Ginger Syrup*, Angostura Bitters,  top Club Soda
Preparation: Fill a shaker with an old fashioned glass worth of ice. Add all ingredients except for the club soda. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds, then dump into old fashioned glass. Set lemon wheel and sliver of cinnamon-candied ginger on top then top with club soda.  *Cinnamon Candied Ginger Syrup: Combine 1/4 lb. peeled ginger root (sliced 1/8" on a 45-degree bias using a mandolin), 2 cups of water, and 4 cinnamon sticks in a pot (or pan) and bring to cusp of a light simmer. Continue to barely simmer for 30 minutes. Add 1 cup of demerara sugar and stir until fully dissolved. Lower heat and keep just below simmering. Continue to heat until almost all liquid is reduced and remaining sugar is just beginning to caramelize (2-3 hours). Remove from heat and spoon slivers of ginger (along with a generous dollop of now thick syrup) onto a sheet of parchment or wax paper. Let cool for at least 2 hours then store layered on the paper sealed in a ziplock bag. Remove cinnamon sticks and reserve syrup.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila,  D'Aristi Xtabentun Honey Liqueur
Preparation: Fill Chinaco stemmed flute with prosecco, cava or other dry sparkling. Garnish with Luxardo Cherry pinned inside of lemon peel and rested across rim. The cherry garnish which will be EVER so delicately laid across the top of the glass, should flame in my opinion. You can dip the in high-proof spirits and light it up!

Ingredients: Japanese Whisky, Amaro Angeleno, Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, Lemon Juice
Preparation: Fill shaker with ingredients and ice. Shake. Strain into old fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Luxardo Limoncello,  Luxardo Aperitivo, Tonic water
Preparation: Fill up a stem-less wine glass with ice and pour the ingredients over, stir and serve.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Fresh Lime Juice, Bitter Lemon Soda
Preparation: Fill up a stemmed wine glass with ice then pour the ingredients, stir and serve.

Ingredients: Luxardo Apricot Liqueur,  BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco,  Elderflower Liqueur, White dry white(preferably Sauvignon), Club soda
Preparation: Fill up a wine glass with ice then pour the ingredients, stir and serve.

Ingredients: Mezcal, Jamaica basil flower syrup*,  Fresh grapefruit juice,  Fresh lime juice
Preparation: Flash shake, strain onto fresh ice, top with Mexican Squirt. Salted starfruit garnish.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, Fresh Lime Juice,  Agave,  Ancho Reyes Ancho Chile Liqueur
Preparation: For a punch, combine Ypioca, lime, agave and Ancho Reyes together. Add fresh pineapple chunks, 3 thin sliced chiles (seeds included) and 1 star anise to garnish.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial,  Lillet Rose,  Guava Nectar,  Fresh Lime Juice,  Agave,  top Banfi Rosa Regale Sparkling Wine
Preparation: For punch, combine Ypioca, Lillet Rose, guava nectar, lime and agave. Top with Rosa Regale sparkling and add sliced strawberries and thin-sliced lime wheels to float as garnish.  For individual cocktails, muddle 2-3 strawberry slices w/ agave and add Ypioca, guava and Lillet. Add ice and shake to chill/mix. Strain over ice and top with champagne. Garnish with thin-sliced strawberry. Remember, this is an aperitif style so it's meant to be refreshing but not necessarily sweet.

Ingredients: BarSol Supremo Moste Verde Italia Pisco, Fresh Cantaloupe Juice,  Fresh Lime Juice,  Beet Sugar Water*, 1  Egg White
Preparation: Garnish with 3 drops of Angostura Bitters over foam.  *Beet Sugar Water: -- 50% Beet Sugar -- 50% Water

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum,  Darjeeling simple syrup, Lime juice
Preparation: Garnish: mint and lime wheel

Ingredients: Old Tom Gin,  7-Spice Syrup*,  Lemon Juice, Fever-Tree Tonic
Preparation: Garnished with orange peel and star anise. Served over the rocks in a stemless wine glass.  *7-Spice Syrup: -- Pink Peppercorn -- Star Anise -- Sumac -- Cinnamon -- Nutmeg -- Coriander -- Cardamom

Ingredients: Genevieve Gin, 1 bottle Lager
Preparation: Genevieve is Hotaling's interpretation of genever, an ancient and mysterious gin style. The most common way to consume genever has always been straight. If you are planning to set sail for the day, picnic or do something else to enjoy the great outdoors, we recommend throwing a bottle of Genevieve in the freezer the evening before your outing and moving it to the cooler day of. We sip it straight while enjoying a lager. Glassware is dealer's choice, but cordial glasses are elegant and fun.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Old Tom Gin, Real Lemon Juice, Strawberry-Raspberry Simple Syrup*
Preparation: Hard vigorous shake with high density ice for 5-6 seconds. Hawthorne and fine strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a mint sprig spanked and lightly rubbed around the edge of the glass. Raspberry garnish and mint sprig attached to the raspberry. Channel zest lemon bath over the glass.  *Strawberry-Raspberry Turbinado "Sugar in the Raw" Simple Syrup: -- 2 C Water -- 2 C Sugar in the Raw Turbinado Sugar -- 15 Raspberries -- 3 Strawberries, quartered -- 3 Mint Leaves  As the water boils, slowly add sugar a few spoon fulls at a time and whisk vigorously into the boiling water until all 2 cups have been dissolved. Continue to keep on high heat for 5 mins. Then take raspberries, strawberries, and mint leaves and macerate all components together and add into the boiling simple syrup. Reduce heat to low-medium heat for the next 15 mins. After that allow simple syrup to cool down and rest for additional 15 mins.  Double strain the simple syrup through fine strainers until all fruit, seeds and mint leaves are strained out.  Allow to cool.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,  Drambuie, Woodchuck Pumpkin Cider,  Spiced Butter*, Bittermens Elemakule Tiki Bitters
Preparation: Heat cider to 180°F. In a 5 oz cup pour the scotch and drambuie. Add the heated cider. Stir in the spiced butter. Top with 3 drops bitters.  For the garnish, add 2 small cocktail stirrers, hang cookie off of the stirrer so that it leans off of the side of the cup.  *Spiced Butter: -- 1 half Stick Butter -- 1 tbsp Pumpkin Pie Spice -- .5 tbsp Brown Sugar -- .5 tsp Cayenne Pepper  Soften butter, add spices and mix with a spoon until all ingredients are combined.  **Chrusciki Cookies: -- 1 c All-purpose Flour -- 3 Egg Yolks -- 3 tbsp Sour Cream -- 1 tsp Vanilla Extract -- 1 tbsp Dark Rum -- 1 pinch Salt  Using a mixer, incorporate egg yolks into sour cream, add vanilla and rum, kneed in all-purpose flower and salt to taste. Divide dough in half on a floured board and let rest for 20 min. Working with half the dough at a time, roll out to 1/8 in. thickness, cut into 2 in. wide strips, cut these strips on the diagonal at 4 in. intervals. Heat 2 in. of vegetable oil in a large deep skillet to 350°F. Make a slit in the center of each strip of dough. Pull one end through the slit to form a bow. Fry 6 Chrusciki at a time for 1 min. or less per side till golden brown. Drain on a paper towel and dust with confectioners sugar.

Ingredients: 1 pkg, Cranberries, Brown Sugar,  Orange Juice,  King's Ginger Liqueur, 8 whole Pepper Corns, 6  Allspice Berries, 5  Cloves, 1 stick, 2 in Cinnamon
Preparation: Heat cranberries, sugar, OJ and King's Ginger over medium heat. Place the peppercorns, allspice, cloves and cinnamon in a piece of cheesecloth with the end tied. Add to pot. Cook stirring often until cranberries soften about 25 to 30 min. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.

Ingredients: Chinaco Reposado Tequila,  D'Aristi Xtabentun Honey Liqueur, Peychaud's Bitters
Preparation: Ice: Large block or spherical

Ingredients: White Rum, Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, Coconut Milk, Fresh Lime Juice,  Demerara Sugar, Miracle Mile Forbidden Barrel Aged Bitters, 3  Roasted Cherries, Black Rum, Everclear
Preparation: In a blender, combine white rum, Luxardo, coconut milk, lime juice, sugar, bitters, 3 cherries, and 1 cup ice and purée until smooth; pour into a tiki glass and top with black rum. Place halved cherry, cut-side up, on top of cocktail and fill with Everclear before lighting cherry on fire.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka (Coffee-Infused),  Café Moka,  Cardamom syrup*, 2 Tbsp Soy milk coffee foam**, 1 pinch Espresso powder
Preparation: In a Boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients (not the foam) with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Double strain the cocktail into an espresso cup. Using an aero-latte frothing whip froth the coffee infused soy milk and spoon the froth over the cocktail. Sprinkle with a little espresso powder.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka (Root-Infused),  Cardamaro,  Fresh lemon juice,  Grade-A dark maple syrup, Fenteman's ginger beer, 4 inch Whole licorice root
Preparation: In a Boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain the cocktail over whole hard ice cubes in a 13 oz. rocks glass and top with the ginger beer. Garnish with the licorice root.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Lustau Amontillado Sherry,  St. Elizabeth Allspice Dram,  Burned Demerara Sugar Syrup*, 1 tincture Bob's Vanilla Bitters,  Vanilla Powder, 1  Egg White
Preparation: In a Boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients in a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10-12 shakes to blend the egg whites. Once blended add cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds and strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Let the cocktail settle and sprinkle with the vanilla powder.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Fresh Lemon Juice, Rothman & Winter Orchard Pear Liqueur,  Cranberry Juice, 1 tincture Fee Brothers Cranberry Bitters, 10  Fresh Cranberries
Preparation: In a Boston shaker combine and muddle the fresh lemon juice and cranberries. Add the remaining liquid ingredients except the club soda with hard ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds pour directly into a highball add a little more ice to fill the glass and top with the club soda. Garnish with a few pear slices and fresh cranberries.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Boiron Kalamansi Juice,  Thai Basil Syrup*,  Cocchi Americano, Fentimans Ginger Beer
Preparation: In a Boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain over ice into a 16 oz. highball or Collins glass and top with the ginger beer. Garnish with the candied ginger using 2 toothpicks placed on the rim of the glass.  *Thai Basil Syrup: -- 1 C Chopped Thai Basil -- 2 C Granulated Sugar -- 1 C Water  In a 1 qt. saucepot bring the water and sugar to boil and stir until sugar is completely dissolved. Add the chopped Thai basil to the pot and remove from heat. Let the basil steep for 1 hour or until syrup is room temperature. Strain the basil out of the syrup using a fine mesh sieve and store covered in fridge.

Ingredients: Oatmeal-Infused Karlsson's Gold Vodka*, Ginger Beer,  Oloroso Sherry,  St. Elizabeth Allspice Dram,  Molasses, Pumpkin Puree, 1 tincture Fee Brothers Black Walnut Bitters
Preparation: In a Boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer. Shake vigorously for 25 seconds and strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass. Top with the ginger beer and grate the fresh nutmeg over the top.  *Oatmeal-Infused Karlsson's Gold Vodka: -- 750 ml Karlsson's Gold Vodka -- 2 C Raw Oats  Using a large sauté pan toast the oats for about 10 minutes constantly watching them and making sure they don't burn. Once aromatic and have a touch of color add the oats to a mason jar with the vodka and let infuse for 12-24 hours. Strain and press out all the vodka from the oats. Return the liquid to the bottle and store in a cool dark place.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Pineapple juice,  Fresh lime juice,  Kaffir lime & tamarind compound syrup*
Preparation: In a Boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Garnish with 1/2 piece kaffir lime leaf. (Clap the leaf several times before placing on top of the cocktail to release the aromatics.)

Ingredients: Apple & Cinnamon-Infused Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  J. T. Taylor's Falernum,  Fresh lemon juice, Fresh Cider, 1 tincture Bar Keep Baked apple bitters
Preparation: In a Boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. Double strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Garnish with the apple slice. Can also be served warm.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka, Lemon curd (or a large bar spoon), Brut Champagne
Preparation: In a Boston shaker, combine the Karlsson's and the lemon curd with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30-40 seconds. Add the champagne to the shaker, stir until mixed well and double strain the cocktail into a 4.5 oz. coupe glass. Garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils into the glass. Rub the entire rim with the twist before dropping the twist into the glass.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Luxardo Espresso Italian Liqueur, Cream, Mexican Coca Cola
Preparation: In a bucket glass, combine Hophead, coffee liqueur, and cream. Add Ice and give a quick stir. Top with cold Mexican Coke and garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka, Spiced apple shrub*, Chilled club soda
Preparation: In a chilled mixing glass combine the Karlsson's gold vodka and the spiced apple shrub with cracked ice and stir for 20 seconds. Add the chilled club soda to the mixing glass, stir just until mixed and strain into a frozen champagne flute. Garnish with two apple slices placed on the rim.

Ingredients: Old Potrero Straight Rye Whiskey,  Luxardo Apricot Liqueur,  Luxardo Fernet,  Lemon juice,  Homemade orgeat, Angostura bitters, Fee Bros Orange bitters
Preparation: In a collins glass, add ingredients beginning with orgeat and ending with rye. Fill glass half full with minted crushed ice. Begin "swizzling" cocktail with stick until cocktail is blended and ice forms on outside of glass. Top with more minted crushed ice and garnish with lemon and mint.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Red Vermouth (Antica Formula), Good quality sharp lemonade
Preparation: In a highball glass full of ice add No.3, King's Ginger and red vermouth. Top up with the lemonade and serve with a slice of ginger and a wedge of pink grapefruit.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Aperol,  Raspberry/white pepper syrup,  Fresh lemon juice,  Fresh cucumber juice, Fresh mint, 2 dashes Celery bitters
Preparation: In a mixing glass muddle mint, add all other ingredients and ice, shake, fine strain into a double old fashioned glass over fresh cracked ice. Garnish with cucumber slices and raspberries.

Ingredients: Rye Whiskey,  H by HINE,  Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth Bianco, Benedictine, Angostura Bitters, Peychaud's Bitters
Preparation: In a mixing glass, add all ingredients, then fill halfway with ice. Stir with a barspoon until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Rub the lemon twist around the rim, drop it in the cocktail, and serve.

Ingredients: Mezcal,  Fresh Lemon Juice, Apple Cider Reduction,  Cinnamon-Chipotle Syrup*, House-made Apple Pie Bitters**
Preparation: In a mixing glass, add ice and shake with all of the ingredients. Strain over new ice (large sphere ice cube) and serve in old fashioned glass and grate fresh cinnamon over the ice.  *Apple Cider Reduction: Boil apple cider until it reduces in volume by half.  **Cinnamon-Chipotle Syrup: Bring 1 cup sugar, 1 cup water and 3 cinnamon sticks to boil, take off heat and let steep for 20mins, add chipotle powder and mix well.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Fee Brothers Black Walnut Bitters,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Luxardo Fernet
Preparation: In a mixing glass, add the first three ingredients over ice. Stir to chill. In a separate coupe glass, add .5 oz of Luxardo Fernet and swirl glass until it is fully coated with the Fernet. Strain chilled cocktail from mixing glass into the Fernet-rinsed coupe (discard excess fernet). Garnish by placing a Luxardo Cherry into the bottom of the glass.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Lychee juice, .5  Lime, juiced, 1  Passion fruit, Ginger beer
Preparation: In a mixing glass, combine Pink Pigeon Rum, Lychee Juice and the juice from 1/2 a lime. Add the pulp of one passion fruit (to prep passion fruit: cut in half, setting aside a small slice for garnish and scoop out the pulp and drop both the pulp and peel into the glass). Add ice and shake vigorously. Pour in a tall glass over ice, top with ginger beer.  Garnish with the passion fruit wedge to serve.

Ingredients: Chinaco Anejo Tequila,  Xtabentun Liqueur (honey, anis), Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters, Fee Brothers Aztec Chocolate Bitters
Preparation: In a pint glass pour all the ingredients, stir and strain into a bucket glass 3/4 full of ice and garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Red Vermouth (Antica Formula), Good quality sharp lemonade
Preparation: In a punch bowl add ingredients per person.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Spiced Apricot Syrup*,  House-made Orgeat,  Lemon Juice,   Egg Whites,  top Anchor Christmas Ale 2016
Preparation: In a shaker mix all ingredients discarding the beer and dry shake vigorously to activate the egg whites. Add ice and shake for about 10 sec and double strain into 8 oz glass and top with beer. Garnish with a marigold flower.  *Spiced Apricot Syrup: -- Organic Earl Grey Tea -- Green Cardamom -- Juniper Berries

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, St. Germain,  Yellow Chartreuse,  Lemon Juice, 1  Strawberry
Preparation: In a shaker, gently muddle the strawberry. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a coupe. Garnish with strawberry.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Fresh lemon juice, Simple syrup, 5 leaves Mint leaves
Preparation: In a shaker, muddle the mint and simple syrup. Add the lemon juice and gin, and fill with ice. Shake, and double-strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Ingredients: Vanilla flavored Vodka,  Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, Fresh sweet n' sour mix, Prosecco,  oz Sliced plum, 2 sprigs Mint sprig
Preparation: In a tall glass muddle the mint and plum with fresh sweet n' sour, pour the liquors then fill up with ice and top with Prosecco.

Ingredients: Nikka Coffey Malt Whisky,  Demerara Syrup, Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters
Preparation: In an old fashioned glass, muddle the lemon peel with the bitters and demerara syrup, just enough to bruise the peel and release its oils. Add Coffey Malt and ice, and stir for 20 to 30 seconds, or until well chilled.

Ingredients: English Harbour Rum 5 YO,  Honey, 3  Lime Wedges, 4  Basil Leaves,  top Ginger Ale
Preparation: In collins glass, gently muddle honey, lime and basil leaves. Add English Harbour rum and ice and stir. Top with ginger ale.

Ingredients: Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky,  Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso,  Dolin Vermouth, Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters
Preparation: In mixing glass or cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine whiskey, vermouth, and bitters. Stir well, about 20 seconds, then strain into cocktail glass. Add cherry and serve.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Simple Syrup,  Lime Juice,  Pomegranate Syrup, 4 large Mint Leaves
Preparation: In mixing glass, using a spoon, crush 2 mint leaves in the simple syrup, and add gin, lime juice and pomegranate syrup. Pour into ice-filled shaker. Shake well and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Float remaining 2 mint leaves for garnish.

Ingredients: Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon,  Creme de Cacao,  Pierre Ferrand Dry Orange Curacao, The Bitter Truth Jerry Thomas Bitters
Preparation: In old fashioned glass, lightly muddle orange zest with bitters and orange curacao.  Add bourbon and creme de cacao then stir with ice for proper dilution (depending on ice) and mixing of ingredients.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Luxardo Espresso Italian Liqueur, Heavy cream,  Simple syrup
Preparation: In one shaker, mix heavy cream and simple syrup and dry shake vigorously until it's whipped. In another, shake Pink Pigeon Rum and Luxardo Espresso with ice.  Pour into a coupe, and then carefully top with the cream.  It should layer perfectly.  The vanilla complexity of the rum pairs awesomely with coffee and cream.

Ingredients: Chinaco Anejo Tequila,  Mezcal,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Agave Nectar, Fee Brothers Aztec Chocolate Bitters, 2 cubes Sugar
Preparation: In rocks glass, make an emulsion by using a glass muddler (wood muddlers absorb the ingredients too much). Place sugar cubes in glass. Add mezcal onto the cubes. Add bitters, onto cubes. Add drops of agave nectar, onto cubes. Add Luxardo, onto cubes. Muddle well to make a "syrup" paying attention the blending of all ingredients.  Take the long orange peel and twist all the essential oils into glass. Leave peel in glass.  Place Gläce Luxury Ice G-Cubed in glass. Rotate Gläce G-Cubed so that it becomes coated and chills the "syrup" swirl around the inside of glass. Pour the Anejo Tequila over Gläce G-Cubed. Stir with glass swizzle. Garnish with 3 Luxardo Cherries, speared.

Cocktail: And The Cherry On Top Is...
Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Vodka,  Root 23 Cherry Almond Simple Syrup, Lemon Juice,  splash Club Soda
Preparation: In the bottom of a cocktail shaker, muddle pitted cherries if using. Add Luxardo Maraschino, vodka, fresh lemon juice and simple syrup. Shake hard, then double strain (though a fine mesh strainer) into a tall glass with fresh ice. Add a splash of soda and stick a cherry on top.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka, Nigori sake (Unfiltered),  Fresh Shibori Yuzu juice,  Simple syrup (2:1 sugar water),  Thai chili, 4-5 sprigs Fresh cilantro (stems on)
Preparation: In the small tin of a Boston shaker set, combine the cilantro sprigs, thai chili, yuzu juice, simple syrup and a small piece of ice. Muddle these ingredients well. Add the remaining liquid ingredients to the shaker with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds.  Double strain the cocktail over ice into a 13 oz. rocks glass.  Garnish with the Thai chili piece and the cilantro sprig.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka, Potato juice*,  Benedictine,  Lemon juice ,  Cinnamon honey syrup**, Black pepper,  Salt
Preparation: Juice potato and strain into a nearby usable container (must be done as close to drink making process as possible since oxidization will occur quickly). Add vodka, potato juice, lemon, Benedictine, cinnamon-honey syrup, and salt and pepper to mixing glass. Add ice, and shake and fine strain over fresh ice.

Ingredients: 1  Half Small Cucumber, 1  Medium Carrot, 1  Green Apple, cored, 3-4  Kale Leaves, 1  Big Handful Spinach Leaves, 1  Small Hunk Ginger,  Pastis Prado
Preparation: Juice the ingredients and pour into a chilled glass (do not use ice or the drink will lose body).  Top with Pastis Prado or absinthe and garnish with a sprig of mint.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Fresh pressed Apple Cider, Hard Apple Cider, 1 stick Cinnamon stick
Preparation: Method:  Simmer on a gentle heat for 30 minutes and garnish with a cinnamon stick

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila, Lime Juice,  Prickly Pear Puree,  Agave
Preparation: Mint salt on the rim. Garnish with mint sprig.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, Luxardo Amaro Abano, Cream of Coconut,  Fresh pineapple juice,  Fresh lime juice, 3 dashes Angostura bitters
Preparation: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth and icy. Pout into a glass and top with 3 dashes of angostura bitters.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Orange Juice, Pineapple Juice, Ginger Ale,  Grenadine, 1  Fresh-Squeezed Lime Juice
Preparation: Mix all ingredients in a large pitcher, add ice, and enjoy!

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, Compas Box Great King Street Blended Scotch Whisky, Byrrh Grand Quinquina,  Anchor Christmas Ale 2016*, Bittercube Corazon Bitters, The Bitter Truth Orange Bitters
Preparation: Mix all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir for 15-20 secs depending on the type of ice. Strain over a large rock and garnish with an orange peel expressing the oils over the cocktail.  *Anchor Christmas Ale 2016 w/ Honey (reduction) 2:1 (2-parts Beer to 1-part Honey)

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  H by HINE,  Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc,  Oloroso & Moscatel Blend*, The Bitter Truth Xocolate Bitters, Orange Bitters,   Walnut Oil
Preparation: Mix all ingredients in a tin except for the walnut oil. Utilizing the throwing technique, throw the mixture from one vessel to another vessel until chilled to air out the ingredients. Coat coupe glass with walnut oil and pour the mixture. Garnish with a dehydrated orange.  *Oloroso & Moscatel Blend: -- 2 parts César Florido Moscatel Special -- 1 part Lustau Oloroso Sherry  Blend ingredients.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, Fresh Lemon Juice,  Simple Syrup, Perfect Puree White Peach, Soda Water
Preparation: Mix all ingredients together.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Orange Juice,  Lemon Juice,  Batavia Arrack,  Simple Syrup, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Mix all ingredients together.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, Luxardo Bitter
Preparation: Mix all the liquid contents together in a heavy-bottomed tumbler with ice. Stir. Add a slice of orange and lemon zest to decorate.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Lime Juice,  Bay Leaf-Infused Honey Syrup*, Clover's Gingersnap, 1 pinch Cinnamon
Preparation: Mix all together and shake and double strain into a coupe without ice. *Bay Leaf-Infused Honey Syrup: • 3 cups honey to 1 cup water • 4 bay leaves, crumbled Bring to a boil. Stir until honey completely dissolves in water. Turn off heat and allow 2 hours to cool.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, King's Ginger Liqueur, Campari, Sweet Vermouth
