Preparation: Mix equal parts of the 4 spirits and age in a 5 liter oak barrel for 30 days. Transfer into glass bottles and rest for a minimum of 3 days. Make giant (2" x 2") ice cubes with an orange peel frozen inside. Pour negroni on ice cube and serve.

Ingredients: Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira,  Fresh Lemon Juice,  Sparkling Apple Juice, Simple Syrup,  Seltzer
Preparation: Mix ingredients in the punch bowl.

Ingredients: Christmas Spirit, Oloroso Sherry,  Walnut Liqueur, Regans' Orange Bitters, Pear Bitters
Preparation: Mix ingredients together then pour over crushed ice into a Julep tin. Dust with salt, sugar, and cinnamon.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin or H by HINE,  Fresh Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup, Sparkling Wine
Preparation: Mix the gin or cognac, lemon juice and syrup in a cocktail shaker. Pour the contents into a Champagne flute. Top up with Champagne. Add a Luxardo Cherry or a peel of lemon.

Cocktail: A Mi Manera (My Way) Pisco Punch
Ingredients: BarSol Selecto Italia Pisco, Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, Minta Soda, 1 pinch Citric Acid or Lime Juice, Pineapple Sorbet
Preparation: Mix the Pisco, apricot liqueur and citric acid ingredients together in a punch bowl and allow to rest for 45 minutes. Place a large 2.2 lb. ice block 10 minutes before serving. Scoop the pineapple sorbet in a punch glass and fill up with the mix, top up with mint-flavored soda. Garnish with candied pineapple wheel from Dress the Drink.

Ingredients: Blanco Tequila,  Luxardo Bitter Bianco,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Fresh Lime Juice,  Rich Simple Syrup (2:1)
Preparation: Mount all ingredients in a shaker tin. Add ice. Hard shake. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Ginger Brown*, Hella hula bitters, 3 beans Cocao beans
Preparation: Muddle 3 cacao beans in a mixing glass, add vodka, ginger-brown sugar, and Bitter Beast Hella Hula bitters. Add ice and vigorously shake to incorporate cacao flavor. Fine strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cocao bean.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Lime juice,  Simple syrup, 2  Mint leaves, muddled, 3  Cucumber slices, muddled
Preparation: Muddle 3-4 cucumber slices and a couple mint leaves. Shake and strain into martini or coupe glass. Garnish with lime or mint or cucumber.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Fresh Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup (1:1), Regans' Orange Bitters, 5 large Basil Leaves, 16 whole Black Peppercorns
Preparation: Muddle 4 basil leaves, 16 peppercorns and simple syrup in shaker tin. Add all other ingredients except final basil leaf. Add ice. Shake vigorously. Fine strain into chilled cocktail glass. Express lemon oil from lemon swath over drink. Garnish with lemon swath and final basil leaf.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Fresh lime juice
Preparation: Muddle a small handful of fresh mint leaves, ¾ oz simple syrup (equal parts sugar and water)  1 oz fresh lime juice. Add crushed ice to the glass to fill half way. pour in 2 oz of Pink Pigeon. Swizzle to incorporate ingredients and slowly add in the rest of the crushed ice.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Lime juice,  Cane sugar syrup, Club soda
Preparation: Muddle basil in mixing glass, add all ingredients except club soda. Shake and strain into a collins glass, top with club soda.  Top with crushed ice and garnish with a basil sprig.

Ingredients: Brandy,  Orange Cordial, Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 1  Luxardo Cherry (muddled), Aromatic Bitters, Cherry Bitters
Preparation: Muddle cherry in liquid ingredients. Shake, double strain over cracked ice. Garnish with two more cherries on a pick with an orange flag.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka, 3  Sun Gold Cherry Tomatoes, 4  Lovage Leaves,  Lime Juice,  Agave Syrup (1 water),  Luxardo Aperitivo, 1 pinch Hepps Ghost Pepper Salt
Preparation: Muddle everything in a tin except Hophead. Then add Hophead and ice and shake and strain into a rocks glass with ice and garnish with a lovage sprig.

Ingredients: Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky,  Tippleman's Barrel Smoked Maple Syrup, Regans' Orange Bitters, Angostura Bitters, 1 disc Orange, 1 disc Lemon, 1 slice Peach
Preparation: Muddle fruit, bitters and syrup. Add ice (1 large cube if available). Top with Whisky. Long stir.

Ingredients: BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco,  Simple Syrup,  Orange Juice,  Lemon, El Guapo Tonic Syrup, El Guapo Tonic Bitters, 3  Cucumber Slices, 2  Mint Sprig
Preparation: Muddle mint and cucumber with the simple syrup in a shaker tin. Combine the remainder of the ingredients in the tin. Shake vigorously. Double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a collins glass. Fill with ice and garnish with a cucumber slice.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, Fresh Ginger Syrup, 1 slice Orange slice, Chinese Five Spice Bitters
Preparation: Muddle Orange Slice. Add Nikka. Add Ginger Syrup. Stir over Ice. Add bitters.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO,  Luxardo Amaro Abano, House-made Rasta Bitters
Preparation: Muddle orange twist with sugar. Add ice. Pour ingredients over ice. Add bitters

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum,  Luxardo Aperitivo,  Simple syrup,  Lemon juice, Ginger beer, 4 pieces Chopped pineapple, 3 pieces Ginger root
Preparation: Muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup, then add Aperitivo and rum, shake well, over ice and top up with Ginger beer.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum,  Simple syrup,  Lemon juice,  Luxardo Bitter, Ginger beer, 4 pieces Pineapple, 4 pieces Ginger root
Preparation: Muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup. Add rum. Shake well, over ice and top with ginger beer and Luxardo Bitter

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Peach Puree,  Lime Juice, 3  Raspberries, Sparkling Wine
Preparation: Muddle raspberries in mixing glass. Add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a well chilled coupe. Top off with sparkling wine. Garnish with raspberry and mint.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Peach Puree,  Lime Juice, 3  Raspberries
Preparation: Muddle raspberries in mixing glass. Add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. Shake vigorously strain over fresh ice. Garnish with raspberry and mint.

Ingredients: Chinaco Reposado Tequila,  Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec),  Fresh grapefruit juice,  Lemon juice,  Simple syrup, 4 pieces Red bell pepper, Mint sprigs
Preparation: Muddle red pepper and mint. Add all other ingredients. Shake well over ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with red pepper slice and mint sprig.

Ingredients: Breck Bourbon,  Dancing Pines Black Walnut Bourbon,  Punt e Mes,  King's Ginger Liqueur
Preparation: Muddle sage and Thyme. Stirred, over ice in single rocks glass. Burnt orange, and thyme sprig to garnish.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila, Wild Hibiscus Tea,  Fresh Lime Juice,  Agave Nectar,   Strawberries,  top Sparkling Water
Preparation: Muddle strawberries in a shaker with agave nectar, add lime juice, hibiscus tea, and Chinaco Blanco. Top with sparkling water.

Ingredients: Demerara Sugar, 1  Roasted Cherry, Cherry-Infused Vodka,  Amaro di Angostura,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Miracle Mile Forbidden Barrel Aged Bitters
Preparation: Muddle sugar and 1 roasted cherry in a rocks glass until the sugar has dissolved; add vodka, Amaro, Maraschino, and bitters and stir. Add 1 large ice cube and garnish with half a roasted cherry and the tarragon.  Cherry-Infused Vodka: - 1 cup pitted cherries, quartered - 1 cup vodka Combine cherries and vodka in a bottle; cover, and let sit to meld the flavors for 3-5 days.

Ingredients: Lime Juice, Basil, Tonic Water, Junipero Gin
Preparation: Muddle the basil with the lime juice, then add tonic water. Fill glass with ice and stir in the gin.

Ingredients: Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica,  Luxardo Sour Cherry Syrup (Previously Amarena), 5  Kumquats, Mango Flavored Rum
Preparation: Muddle the fruit with syrup in a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously. Pour all ingredients(do not strain) in a tumbler glass. Add a float of Mango flavored Rum.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec),  Elderflower Liqueur, Fresh lime juice, .5  Kiwi
Preparation: Muddle the kiwi pulp with lime juice in a shaker tin. Add ice and liquors and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: 2  Kumquats, 2  Lychee, Bulleit Rye, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Fresh Lemon Juice,  Simple Syrup,  Egg White,  Fever Tree Ginger Beer
Preparation: Muddle the kumquats and lychee in a cocktail shaker. Add the whiskey, King's Ginger, lemon juice, syrup and white egg, and shake very hard. Double strain into a highball glass filled with ice spheres.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,  King's Ginger Liqueur, Angostura Bitters,   Lemon Peel
Preparation: Muddle the lemon peel and bitters with the King’s Ginger to release the oils.  Add scotch, stir, and enjoy.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Campari,  Velvet Falernum, Lime Juice,  Simple Syrup, 3 large chunks Pineapple
Preparation: Muddle the pineapple adding more or less simple syrup as needed and depending on sweetness of the pineapple. Add all other ingredients. Give the mixture a hard shake. Double strain into chilled coupe.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, White Port,  Lemon Juice,  Honey Cinnamon Syrup*, 1  Whole Egg, 8  Muddled Sage Leaves
Preparation: Muddle the sage in a mixing tin. Add the remaining ingredients and dry shake (no ice) for 15 seconds. Add ice and shake another 15 seconds to chill down the drink. Double strain into a large coupe glass. Garnish with a whole star anise floated in the middle of the egg white.  *Honey Cinnamon Syrup: -- 16 oz Honey -- 2 Cinnamon Sticks -- 8 oz Water Combine all the ingredients together in a pot. Place on the stove and bring to a simmer, stirring the honey so it doesn’t burn and let the pot simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat and place on an ice bath. Place in a container and label and date it. Store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, King's Ginger Liqueur, Orange juice, Simple syrup, 2  Cucumber slices, muddled, 2  Raspberries, muddled
Preparation: Muddle two cucumber slices, two raspberries and simple syrup in a highball, add ice. Shake gin, ginger liqueur and orange juice with ice. Strain into highball glass.  Garnish with a candied ginger stick.

Ingredients: New York Apple Whiskey, King's Ginger Liqueur,  Lemon,  Lemongrass ginger syrup,  Egg white
Preparation: Muddled ginger root. Shaken, served up, cinnamon stick and apple to garnish.

Ingredients: Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or, C. Drouin Pommeau de Normandie, Orange Bitters
Preparation: On the rocks with twist.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Maurin Quina,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Angostura Bitters, Black Walnut Bitters
Preparation: Place all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until proper dilution. Strain over a large hand cut ice cube placed in a double rocks glass. Garnish with a Luxardo Maraschino Cherry on a pick.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, Sweetened Condensed Coconut Milk, Almond Milk,  Briottet Creme de Framboise (Raspberry),  Tempus Fugit Creme de Cacao, 1 handful Fresh Raspberries, Rubarb Bitters
Preparation: Place all ingredients in a mixing tin, muddle fresh raspberries, add ice and shake until tin is frosty. Strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with orange wedge.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Yoichi Single Malt 15 YO,  Cocchi Americano Rosa,  Luxardo Amaro Abano, Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters
Preparation: Place all ingredients into a Yarai mixing glass with ice and stir. Strain into a coupe. Garnish with an apple slice.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin, Fever-Tree Tonic Water, 3 cubes Tonic Water Ice Cubes*
Preparation: Place ice cubes in a rocks glass. Add ingredients. Garnish with your choice of: rosemary, basil, lavender, edible flowers, or a lemon, lime or orange twist.  *Tonic Water Ice Cubes: Fill an ice cube tray with tonic water and freeze.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Tempus Fugit Liqueur de Violettes,  Fresh lemon juice
Preparation: Place ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake hard for seven seconds. Double strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Orange Bitters, Sparkling Wine
Preparation: Place King's Ginger and orange bitters in a Champagne flute, and top with sparkling wine. No garnish.

Ingredients: 5  Concord grapes, 3  Blackberries, BarSol Primero Quebranta Pisco, Crème Yvette, Lemon juice,  Egg white
Preparation: Place the Concord grapes and blackberries in a shaker and muddle. Add the rest of the ingredients and ice. Shake, and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with Concord grapes and lemon peel twisted to release oils.

Ingredients: Garrison Brothers Flagship Bourbon,  Luxardo Apricot Liqueur, Australian Bitters Company Aromatic Bitters,   Lemon Peel
Preparation: Place the lemon peel in an Old Fashioned glass and muddle with bitters. In a mixing glass filled with ice, add the bourbon and apricot liqueur, then strain into the glass. Garnish with cherry and orange slice, and serve over an ice sphere.

Ingredients: Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira, 4  Lime wedges, 1  Pinapple wheel,  Gomme syrup, Pisco
Preparation: Place the lime wedges and pinapple in a tumbler glass with gomme syrup and muddle briskly, then add ice and Amaretto. Stir well and serve with a float of Pisco.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Lime Sweet n' Sour mix,  oz Cucumber wheels,  oz Sprigs of Mint
Preparation: Place the mint and cucumber in a mixing glass and muddle briskly, then add sour mix and liquor. Shake with ice and double strain over ice into a stemmed glass.

Ingredients: Rhum Agricole-style,  Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira,  Fresh lime juice, Cola, Mint sprigs, Bitters
Preparation: Place the mint in a Collins glass and muddle for a few seconds to release the oils, then add ice and ingredients, stir well and serve.

Ingredients: Brandy de Jerez,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, 4 sprigs Mint, Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira
Preparation: Place the mint in a tumbler glass and muddle briskly to release the essential oils, then add the cherry liqueur and the brandy. Fill up the glass with crushed ice, stir well and serve with a float of Luxardo Amaretto. Garnish with 4 sprigs of mint and 3 Luxardo Cherries.

Ingredients: Luxardo Limoncello, Luxardo Bitter, Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, Club Soda,   Fresh Thyme
Preparation: Place the thyme in a tumbler glass and muddle to release the oils, then add ice and ingredients, stir well and serve.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Lemon juice,  Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec),  Heavy Cream, Orange Bitters, Club Soda
Preparation: Pour 2 oz. of Club Soda into a Collin’s Glass. Hard shake first fIve ingredients with ice for at 20 seconds. Slowly strain into the Collins glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Champagne
Preparation: Pour a generous measure of The King's Ginger into a flute. Add chilled Champagne to taste.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Champagne
Preparation: Pour a generous measure of The King's Ginger into a flute. Add chilled Champagne to taste.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, Mai Tai Mix, Soda Water, English Harbour Rum
Preparation: Pour all ingredients and shake in tin. Pour into bucket. Top with rum float, then garnish.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Pear flavored Vodka,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Sherry, Bitters
Preparation: Pour all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec),  Watermelon Liqueur, Cranberry juice,  oz Fresh lime sweet n' sour mix
Preparation: Pour all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain over ice into a Collins or Pilsner glass.

Ingredients: Bonded Rye,  Luxardo Amaro Abano,  Punt e Mes, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir to chill and dilute. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Express the oil from the twist over the drink and discard.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,  Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Orange Juice
Preparation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into coupe glass. Flame orange zest over the top of the glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Blanco Tequila,  D.O.M Benedictine, Bittermens Xocolatl Mole Bitters
Preparation: Pour all liquid ingredients into a mixing glass and stir about 55 times for proper dilution and optimal clarity. Strain into a chilled coupe. Twist fresh lemon peel over cocktail for aroma. Garnish with a simple lemon peel, trimmed neatly.

Ingredients: Luxardo Amaretto di Saschira,  Lime Juice,  fill Club Soda
Preparation: Pour Amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with club soda and serve.

Ingredients: Brandy de Jerez (Foie Gras-Infused), Truffle Tincture,   Atomized Pipe Tobacco Essence
Preparation: Pour brandy into a brandy snifter. Top with 2-3 drops of truffle tincture. Spray Pipe Tobacco Essence on wrist. Smell wrist, sip drink, and enjoy.

Ingredients: Mezcal,  Pierre Ferrand Curaçao,  Gordy’s Cocktail Pickle Brine, Watermelon Juice,  Fresh Grapefruit Juice,  Fresh Lime Juice
Preparation: Pour ingredients in a shaker tin, add ice and shake well.   Fine strain the drink into a double rocks glass filled with ice.   Balance a small watermelon triangle on top of the glass. Grate fresh lime zest on top using a microplane, and then sprinkle with Maldon salt.

Ingredients: Champagne, H by HINE,  Cherry Brandy, Lemon Juice
Preparation: Pour ingredients into a wine glass half-filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a half-slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,   Simple Syrup, 5  Mint Leaves
Preparation: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker and shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over crushed ice with a mint sprig garnish.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Classica, Ginger Citrus Agave Blend, Ginger Ale, Aromatic Bitters
Preparation: Pour ingredients into mug, fill with ice. top with ginger ale. Roll into tin. Roll back into mug. Garnish.

Ingredients: Luxardo Fernet,  King's Ginger Liqueur, Cola, 1 wedge Lemon juice
Preparation: Pour ingredients over crushed ice into a stemmed glass, stir well and serve.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Dry Vermouth,  Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Pour into shaker over ice and shake well. Serve straight up in a martini glass with an orange twist.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur,  top Fever-Tree Ginger Ale, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Pour King's Ginger into an ice-filled collins glass. Top off with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale. Add bitters, and squeeze lime over and serve.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, 1 lemon Lemon, 1 fill Tonic water
Preparation: Pour No.3 gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add a slice of lemon and stir. Top up with tonic water to taste.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  top Fever-Tree Tonic Water,  Maurin Quina
Preparation: Pour No.3 into ice-filled collins glass. Top off with Fever-Tree Tonic Water to just below rim of the glass. Float .25 oz. of Maurin Quina on top of cocktail. Garnish with small spoonful of fresh pomegranate seeds.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,  Lime Juice ,  Green Chartreuse,  Velvet Falernum,  Pineapple Juice
Preparation: Pour over crushed ice with a mint garnish.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve
Preparation: Pour over crushed ice with zest. Garnish with an orange peel.

Ingredients: Hophead Vodka,  Fresh Lime Juice,  splash Soda Water,  top Steam Beer
Preparation: Pour over ice in a pint glass, then fill with steam beer. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a straw.

Ingredients: BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine)
Preparation: Pour Perfecto Amor over ice and garnish with an orange wheel.

Ingredients: Chateau de Montifaud Cognac VS, Lemon Juice,  Orgeat (Almond) Syrup,  Triple Sec,  top Lemonade
Preparation: Pour the Cognac and lemon juice into the glass and then add orgeat syrup; fill with ices cubes and mix with a spoon. At the end, add lemonade and lemon peel.

Ingredients: Chateau de Montifaud Cognac XO, 3  Ice Cubes
Preparation: Pour the Cognac into the glass and add ice cubes. Perceive the aromas that are released as a summer rain that reveals the secrets of the nature...

Ingredients: Chateau de Montifaud XO Silver,  Sugar Syrup,  Lemon Juice, 3  Raspberries,  fill Champagne
Preparation: Pour the Cognac, sugar syrup, lemon juice and 3 pressed raspberries into the shaker, then shake. Strain into the glass (using a cocktail strainer) and fill with chilled Champagne. Garnish with 3 raspberries.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin, Extra Dry Vermouth, 1  Amalfi Lemon
Preparation: Pour the Extra Dry Vermouth into a frozen martini glass (either 7 oz. or 5.5 oz. glass) and coat in a circular motion. Top up the glass with ice cold No.3 gin. Pare the rind of an Amalfi lemon, and give it a twist to extract the oils into the glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Grapefruit flavored Vodka,  Fresh lemon juice, Pomegranate liqueur, Lemon sorbet
Preparation: Pour the first four ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve into a champagne saucer. Top with Pomegranate Liqueur float.

Ingredients: Luxardo Fernet,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Blood orange sorbet
Preparation: Pour the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in a cocktail glass or coupe.

Ingredients: Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, Luxardo Amaro Abano, Orange Bitters, Club Soda
Preparation: Pour the ingredients in an old fashioned glass, then fill up with ice and stir well before serving.

Cocktail: Château Montifaud Lady Touch Triple Sec
Ingredients: Chateau de Montifaud Reserve Speciale Michel Vallet,  Triple Sec, Lemon Juice, Sugar Syrup, 8  Fresh Mint,   Ice Cubes
Preparation: Pour the ingredients in the shaker. Close and shake well until frosted. Strain into the glass. Garnish with fresh mint.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum, Pineapple Juice, Cream of Coconut
Preparation: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail or Collins glass.

Ingredients: Hirsch Small Batch Reserve Bourbon, Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  Chocolate Liqueur, Heavy cream flavored with Hum Liqueur
Preparation: Pour the liquor ingredients over ice and top with half inch (about one centimeter) layer of lightly whipped cream shaken with Hum Liqueur.

Ingredients: 1 coffee spoon Sugar Syrup, 10  Fresh Mint, .25  Sliced Green Lemon, Chateau de Montifaud Cognac VSOP,  Lemon Juice,  Sparkling Water
Preparation: Pour the sugar syrup into the glass and add fresh mint and green lemon. Lightly crush and add ice cubes, Cognac, lemon juice and sparkling water. Mix with a spoon and serve with a straw.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila,  Sage-Cilantro-Lime Syrup,  rinse Montanaro Vermouth , 1  Pomegranate Ice Cube
Preparation: Pre-freeze pomegranate juice into one large cube. Rinse a glass with Montanaro vermouth. Dump any excess out. Build the remainder of spirits and bitters into a shaker tin. Shake vigorously. Strain over the pomegranate ice cube into a rocks glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Honey-Pear Liqueur,  Heavy Cream,  oz Pinch of Cardamom,  oz Dehydrated pear slice
Preparation: Pre-mix the liquors together and keep refrigerated. Serve 2 oz. neat into a small coupe glass. Float the fresh cream on top.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Bitter, Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur, Bourbon, Chocolate Bitters
Preparation: Prepare directly in an old fashioned glass.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial, Fresh Lime Juice, Ancho Chile-Infused Simple Syrup, Ginger Beer, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Punch Preparation Instructions: Combine Ypioca, lime and syrup in bowl. Top with ginger beer and Angostura bitters* (amounts will depend on size of punch and number of anticipated servings). Garnish with thin-sliced dried ancho chiles and lime wheels to float.   *You can optionally skip adding Angostura in punch and instead add a dash or 2 to each individual cocktail as served.   Individual Cocktail Preparation Instructions: Combine ingredients exactly the same way as a traditional Moscow Mule over crushed ice. Garnish with dash or 2 bitters and ancho chile slices. Mint is an optional garnish.

Ingredients: 1 Coconut milk, 1 Condensed milk, Ypiòca, 1 Tbsp Sugar
Preparation: Put 1 1/2 ounces of coconut milk, 1 1/2 ounces of condensed milk, 3 ounces of Ypiòca and tablespoon of sugar in a blender. Mix for a few seconds. Add ice cubes and serve.

Ingredients: 2 Orange Juice, 1 Ypiòca, 1-2 Tbsp Sugar
Preparation: Put 1 1/2 ounces, 2 1/2 ounces orange juice, and 1-2 tablespoons of sugar in a shaker. Add ice cubes and shake for a few seconds. Put in glass and serve.

Ingredients: 1-2 Tbsp Sugar, 1 Ypiòca,   Passion fruit
Preparation: Put 1/2 passion fruit inner part in a blender, 1-2 tablespoons of sugar and 50ml ( 1 1/2 ounces) of Ypiòca. Mix for a few seconds. Filter in a glass and serve with ice.

Ingredients: Peach Juice, 1 Condensed milk, 1 Ypiòca , 1 Tbsp Sugar
Preparation: Put 3 ounces of peach juice, 1 1/2 ounces of Ypiòca, 1 1/2 ounces of condensed milk and 1 tablespoon of sugar in a shaker. Add ice cubes, shake well and serve.

Ingredients: Karlsson's Gold Vodka, 1 cube Brown sugar, Bitter
Preparation: Put a brown sugar cube at the bottom of a frosted glass. Add a splash of bitter and muddle the sugar. Add Karlsson's Gold Vodka and stir with ice. Add lemon and orange peels (which you can burn for added flavor).

Ingredients: 3  Basil Leaves, Karlsson's Gold Vodka,  Pineapple Juice,  Simple Syrup,  Sweet Vermouth,  Lime Juice ,  Egg White, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Put basil leaves in mixing glass. Gently muddle the leaves. Add all ingredients except the bitters or ice. Dry shake the cocktail vigorously. Add the ice and shake again vigorously. Double strain into a coupe. Add a few drops of angostura on top, add cracked pepper, slap one single basil leaf on top for garnish.

Ingredients: H by HINE,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Simple Syrup (1:1), Peychaud's Bitters, Angostura Bitters,  rinse Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure
Preparation: Put ingredients in mixing glass. Stir. Strain into glass that has absinthe rinse. Add lemon zest.

Ingredients: Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, 1 strip Cucumber, Lemon Juice,  top Tonic
Preparation: Quick stir and garnish with rosemary.

Ingredients: rinse Eau de Vie, Junipero Gin, Carpano Antica,  Campari,  Braulio Amaro, 1 pinch Salt
Preparation: Rinse a rocks glass with eau de vie. Combine remaining ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake, and strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon pigtail.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Tempus Fugit Kina L'Aero d'Or,  The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Clear,  Lemon Juice,  rinse Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure
Preparation: Rinse cocktail glass with Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe. Shake rest with ice and strain.

Ingredients: Vieux Pontarlier Absinthe Francaise Superieure, H by HINE, Tempus Fugit Abbott's Bitters, Sugar
Preparation: Rinse entire glass with absinthe, discard, if you must. Stir with ice and strain into an old-fashion glass, garnish with lemon peel.

Ingredients: Gin, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Luxardo Orgeat Syrup, Lemon Juice, Absinthe
Preparation: Rinse glass with absinthe. Add a Luxardo Cherry (covered in its juice) to a mixing glass with remaining ingredients. Stir until cold and slightly rose colored. Single strain, serve with cherry from mixing glass.

Ingredients: Luxardo Bitter Bianco, Seersucker Gin,  Lillet Blanc, Sauternes, Orange Blossom Water
Preparation: Rinse the glass with Orange Blossom Water and pour cocktail. Shake Egg White, Sauternes and Lemon Juice vigorously dry for 25 seconds, then add ice, gin, Luxardo Bitter Bianco and Lillet Blanc, shake again for 10 seconds. Strain into Nick & Nora, garnish with a lemon wheel.

Ingredients: Luxardo Fernet, Luxardo Triplum (Triple Sec), Angostura bitters, 2 slices Satsuma slices, Sioux City Sarsparilla Soda
Preparation: Serve cold and garnish with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream swirled with Luxardo Maraschino Cherry Juice.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Grapefruit Juice,  Ginger/Cardamom/Honey Syrup*,  Lime Juice,  float Tonic Water
Preparation: Serve in a champagne flute up to 60% full and top with tonic water up to 80% full, garnish with a grapefruit twist.  *Ginger/Cardamom/Honey Syrup: Bring about 8 cups of water to a boil, once boiling turn off heat and add 2 cups of cardamom pods. Let sit for about 6 hours. Strain the pods out, add 1 qt (32 oz) of honey and stir until dissolved. For an added cardamom boost: place the cardamom pods with the cardamom/honey "tea" in a blender. Blend and press through a fine strainer so as to discard the solids but keep the flavor.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Hard Apple Cider, Fresh Apple Juice
Preparation: Serve in a handled glass, hot or over ice. Garnish with lemon, cinnamon stick and fresh blackberries.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  Lemon Juice,  Serrano Pepper Syrup*, Mango Juice, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Serve in a julep cup with crushed ice and basil garnish.  *Serrano Pepper Syrup: Take 6 serrano peppers. Slice 4 in half, carefully de-vein and seed them (this will take some of the heat away, make absolutely sure to wash your hands after handling the peppers, avoid touching anything unless you've washed your hands), place a skillet on medium to high heat and roast the peppers until they are a little charred. Once charred place in a blender with about 2 cups of water and throw in the 2 remaining fresh serranos (seeds and all). Blend and strain out the solids. Add 1 cup of demarara sugar to the serrano pepper water and stir until it is dissolved.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,  Lemon Juice, Simple Syrup
Preparation: Serve in a rocks glass with an orange peel garnish and a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Fresh lime, 1 slice Fresh ginger, 4 strawberries Strawberries(muddled)
Preparation: Serve in a tall glass over ice.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Glenrothes Vintage Reserve
Preparation: Serve neat or on the rocks.

Ingredients: 1 Chinaco Reposado, Luxardo Amaro Abano, Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur, Fresh Lemon Juice
Preparation: Serve on one big rock.

Ingredients: Glenrothes Vintage Reserve,  Luxardo Sangue Morlacco Cherry Liqueur,  King's Ginger Liqueur, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Serve on the rocks. Garnish with a Luxardo Cherry.

Ingredients: King's Ginger Liqueur, Fever-Tree Tonic Water, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Serve over ice in a collins glass.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  King's Ginger Liqueur, Fresh grapefruit juice,  Honey,  Fresh lime juice , Fire and Damnation bitters, Club soda
Preparation: Serve tall on the rocks.

Ingredients: Nikka Coffey Grain Whisky,  House-made Allspice Dram,  Heavy Cream,  Simple Syrup, 1  Whole Egg, Chocolate Bitters
Preparation: Served in a snifter with grated cinnamon.

Ingredients: Chinaco Blanco Tequila, Fresh Lime Juice, Agave Nectar
Preparation: Served in v-shaped rocks glass with "vintage ice".

Ingredients: Hangar 1 Buddha's Hand Citron Vodka, Luxardo Limoncello,  Fresh Lemon Juice,  Monin Cane Syrup
Preparation: Served up and finished with a lemon wheel.

Ingredients: Ypioca Brasilizar Cachaca Prata Reserva Especial,  Luxardo Bitter,  Luxardo Maraschino Liqueur,  Lemon Juice, Lemon Bitters
Preparation: Served up in a coupe glass.

Ingredients: H by HINE, Dolin Dry Vermouth,  Giffard Banane du Brésil,  Honey Syrup
Preparation: Served up with a lemon peel garnish.

Ingredients: Nikka Whisky Taketsuru Pure Malt 12 YO, English Harbour Rum,  The Genuine Curacao Liqueur Clear,  Lemon Juice,  Pineapple Juice,  Grenadine*
Preparation: Shake - pebble/crushed ice

Ingredients: Coconut Rum,  Funkin Passion Fruit Puree,  Briottet Creme de Banane,  Fresh squeezed lime, 8 leaves Mint Leaves
Preparation: Shake & Dump into Collins Glass, Top with Prosecco, cap with crushed ice. Garnish with Mint Sprig.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Chateau de Montifaud Pineau des Charentes Blanc,  Lemon Verbena Cordial*,  Lemon Juice,  top Mixwell Young Ginger Ale
Preparation: Shake all ingredients and double strain over fresh ice. Garnish with lemon verbena leaf.  *Lemon Verbena Cordial: -- Fresh Lemon Verbena  -- Fresh Mint -- Grapefruit Peel  -- Lemon Peel -- Pure Cane Sugar -- Citric Acid  Make a fresh herb and citrus peel tea and add sugar and citric acid to taste. Let cool before using.

Ingredients: BarSol Perfecto Amor (Aperitif Wine), Dolin Dry Vermouth,  Lemon Juice,  Agave Syrup
Preparation: Shake all ingredients and double strain. Serve in a hurricane glass, add 2 oz Lager. Garnish with an orange horse-neck peel.

Ingredients: Junipero Gin,  Tempus Fugit Alessio Vermouth di Torino Rosso,  Drambuie,  Rich Brown Sugar Simple Syrup*, 4  Large Pieces Candied Ginger, Angostura Bitters
Preparation: Shake all ingredients and strain into a coupe glass. Express a lemon peel over the drink and discard.  *Rich Brown Sugar Simple Syrup:  -- 2 cups Brown Sugar -- 1 cup Water  Combine sugar and water in a small saucepan over medium heat and stir until sugar dissolves. Remove from heat, let cool to room temperature and transfer to a clean glass jar. Cover and keep refrigerated for up to 2 weeks.

Ingredients: No.3 London Dry Gin,  King's Ginger Liqueur,  Orange marmalade syrup,  Lemon juice, Bergamot tea foam
Preparation: Shake all ingredients except foam, strain into chilled cocktail "coupe". Layer foam onto cocktail. Add garnish.

Ingredients: Pink Pigeon Rum,  White peach puree,  Hibiscus syrup,  Lemon juice,  Ginger ale
Preparation: Shake all ingredients except ginger ale, then strain into chilled cocktail "coupe" glass. Float ginger ale and zest of fresh lemon.

Using a potato masher or a wooden spoon, mash the berries so they release their juices. Stir until the sugar has mostly dissolved and refrigerate overnight. The next day, remove the mixture to a saucepan and heat gently over medium-low heat. Do not bring to a simmer--you simply want to heat the mixture to coax the sugar to dissolve. Remove and put in a blender with sugar until well chopped. Combine all the ingredients in a pot and bring to a boil. Let simmer for 20 mins and then remove from the heat. Let cool and place in a large container. Let the mixture sit overnight then strain out the solids. Save the solids to spin in the ice cream maker (if you have one). Ingredients: Coffee liqueur, Chocolate liqueur, Mezcal,
Preparation:
To ensure that your pork fat is just as delicious as theirs, here’s their adobo marinade and what to do with it (you’ll also need a rack of ribs):

4 ancho chiles, 8 guajillo chiles and 4 chipotle chiles, plus 4 cloves roasted garlic, half a cup of cider vinegar, a quarter teaspoon of Mexican oregano, 1 teaspoon of ground black pepper, a whole clove, a quarter teaspoon of ground cinnamon and a half teaspoon of ground cumin.

Toast the dried chiles and soak in water for at least an hour until they are rehydrated. Drain and discard the soaking liquid. Combine the soaked chiles with the remaining ingredients and purée until smooth.

Cold smoke a rack of baby back pork ribs by taking a large hotel pan with woodchips on one side and charcoal on the other. Place another, smaller, pan with pork ribs, above the charcoal/woodchip pan. Ignite the charcoal, being careful to not ignite the woodchips. Cover both pans with foil and allow to smoke for 10-15 minutes, until desired level of smoke is achieved, then coat with adobo marinade and wrap in tin foil prior to placing ribs in a 300 degree oven for 7 hours. When the ribs have cooled, strain off the fat and use for the infusion.

If you’re having a hard time coming up to the same kind of volume of fat, make up the balance with pork lard from a butcher. To get the same depth of flavor without the ribs, heat up the fat in a pot with a few spoons of the marinade.

Once you’ve got your tub of seasoned pork fat in cooled liquid form, pour equal amounts of Ilegal Joven mezcal and fat into a sealable container. Seal the container and give it a really good shake, then put it in the freezer overnight. When the whole thing is separated and congealed, pour it through a fine mesh chinoise. If you don’t have a chinoise, try a fine mesh strainer, or if you don’t have one of those, try spooning off most of the fat. There will be some beads of orange fat left in the strained mezcal: run that through a few layers of cheesecloth (or coffee filters in a pinch) to get rid of the last of it.

The mezcal is now ready for drinking, straight-up or in a cocktail. 

Habanero tincture

Slice habaneros and add 2 ounces Ilegal Joven mezcal.
Allow to sit overnight or until desired level of heat is achieved.
Cocktail

Combine mezcal and chocolate liqueur in a mixing glass with ice and stir for 45 seconds.
Strain into chilled coupe.
Carefully "sink" the coffee liqueur down the inside of the coupe over a spoon.
Garnish with 5 drops habanero tincture.

Ingredients: Lemon Juice, Strawberries, Sugar, Rose,
Preparation:
Step 1
Pour rosé into a 13x9" pan and freeze until almost solid (it won't completely solidify due to the alcohol), at least 6 hours.

Step 2
Meanwhile, bring sugar and ½ cup water to a boil in a medium saucepan; cook, stirring constantly, until sugar dissolves, about 3 minutes. Add strawberries, remove from heat, and let sit 30 minutes to infuse syrup with strawberry flavor. Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a small bowl (do not press on solids); cover and chill until cold, about 30 minutes.

Step 3
Scrape rosé into a blender. Add lemon juice, 3½ ounces strawberry syrup, and 1 cup crushed ice and purée until smooth. Transfer blender jar to freezer and freeze until frosé is thickened (aim for milkshake consistency), 25–35 minutes.

Step 4
Blend again until frosé is slushy. Divide among glasses.

Step 5
Do Ahead: Rosé can be frozen 1 week ahead.

If it is not frothy, add more milk, or even just some more milk powder. The froth gradually turns to liquid at the bottom of the glass, so you will find that you can sit and drink this for about 1/2 hour, with more iced coffee continually appearing at the bottom. Preparation: Put it all in a blender and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

Ingredients: Lemon juice, Salt, Sugar, Water, Yoghurt,
Preparation: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

Ingredients: Bacardi Limon, Corona,
Preparation: Open the Corona. Fill the empty space in the neck in the bottle with the rum. The bottle should be filled to the top. Plug the bottle with your thumb or the palm of your hand. Turn the bottle upside-down so the rum and beer mix. Turn the bottle rightside-up, unplug, and drink.

Ingredients: Tia maria, Dark rum,
Preparation: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Ingredients: Carbonated water, Egg white, Lemon, Powdered sugar, Light cream, Gin,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Ingredients: Coca-Cola, Lemon, Tequila, Gin, Light rum, Vodka,
Preparation: Combine all ingredients (except cola) and pour over ice in a highball glass. Add the splash of cola for color. Decorate with a slice of lemon and serve.

Ingredients: Lemon peel, Orange spiral, Powdered sugar, Dry Vermouth, Gin, Carbonated water,
Preparation: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Add the twist of lemon peel and the orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

Ingredients: Gin, Sweet Vermouth,
Preparation: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Soda Water, Grapefruit Juice, Coconut Liqueur,
Preparation: Mix the coconut liqueur (preferably tequila) with the grapefruit juice and top with soda water. Garnish with a large grapefruit slice against the inside of the glass.

Ingredients: Lemon peel, Coca-Cola, Gin, Light rum, Tequila, Vodka,
Preparation: Mix all contents in a highball glass and sitr gently. Add dash of Coca-Cola for the coloring and garnish with lemon or lime twist.

Ingredients: Fresh Lemon Juice, Soda Water, Vodka, Elderflower cordial,
Preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice, stir and enjoy!

Ingredients: Mint, Salt, Cumin seed, Water, Yoghurt,
Preparation: Blend in a blender for 3 seconds. Lassi is one of the easiest things to make, and there are many ways of making it. Basically, it is buttermilk (yoghurt whisked with water), and you can choose almost any consistency that you like, from the thinnest to the thickest. Serve cold.

Ingredients: Cocoa powder, Honey, Espresso,
Preparation: Brew espresso. In a coffee mug, place 1 teaspoon of unsweetened powdered cocoa, then cover a teaspoon with honey and drizzle it into the cup. Stir while the coffee brews, this is the fun part. The cocoa seems to coat the honey without mixing, so you get a dusty, sticky mass that looks as though it will never mix. Then all at once, presto! It looks like dark chocolate sauce. Pour hot espresso over the honey, stirring to dissolve. Serve with cream.

Ingredients: Orange juice, Champagne,
Preparation: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

Ingredients: Cherry, Sweet and sour, Triple sec, Orgeat syrup, Light rum,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

Ingredients: Soy Sauce, Worcestershire Sauce, Hot Sauce, Lime Juice, Tomato Juice, Beer,
Preparation:
Mix the beer with tomato juice, freshly squeezed lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, or hot sauce.
Served In a chilled, salt-rimmed glass

Ingredients: Water, Powdered sugar, Bourbon, Mint,
Preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Ingredients: Pepsi Cola, Orange juice, Southern Comfort,
Preparation: Add all contents to a large jug or punch bowl. Stir well!

Ingredients: Angostura Bitters, Maraschino Liqueur, Sweet Vermouth, Gin,
Preparation:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice.

Stir until chilled, and strain into a chilled coupe glass.

Ingredients: Grenadine, Tequila, Absinthe,
Preparation: first you put rhe absinthe, then put tequila, then put the Granadine syrup.

Ingredients: Ginger ale, Lime juice, Vodka,
Preparation: Combine vodka and ginger beer in a highball glass filled with ice. Add lime juice. Stir gently. Garnish.

Ingredients: Brandy, Red wine, Lemon peel, Cinnamon, Cloves, Sugar, Water,
Preparation: Simmer 3 cups water with, sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heat to a "coffee temperature" (DO NOT BOIL) then add the brandy.

Ingredients: Milk, Sugar, Black pepper, Cinnamon, Cloves, Cardamom, Ginger, Tea, Water,
Preparation: Bring 2 cups of water to boil. Add all the ingredients and boil again for about 15 seconds. Let stand for a minute. Warm milk in a pot. Filter tea into cups. Add milk and sugar. That's IT.

Ingredients: lemon, Cucumber, Ginger Beer, Lime Juice, Gin,
Preparation:
Fill glass with ice
Pour Gin and Lime Juice
Fill glass with Ginger Beer
Garnish with Cucumer and Lime slice

Ingredients: Whipped cream, Cocoa powder, Chambord raspberry liqueur, Coffee,
Preparation: pour 6 oz. of coffee in a mug or Irish coffee cup. add coca mix and chambord, mix well and top off with whipped cream.

Ingredients: Mango, Soda Water, Ice, White Rum, Mint, Mango, Lime,
Preparation:
Squeeze the juice from 1½ limes and blend with the mango to give a smooth purée.
Cut the rest of the limes into quarters, and then cut each wedge in half again. Put 2 pieces of lime in a highball glass for each person and add 1 teaspoon of caster sugar and 5-6 mint leaves to each glass. Squish everything together with a muddler or the end of a rolling pin to release all the flavours from the lime and mint.
Divide the mango purée between the glasses and add 30ml white rum and a handful of crushed ice to each one, stirring well to mix everything together. Top up with soda water to serve and garnish with extra mint, if you like.

Ingredients: Angostura bitters, Club soda, Dark rum, Lemon juice, Mint,
Preparation: Put mint with lemon juice in a glas, mash the mint with a spoon, ice, rum & fill up with club soda. Top it with Angostura.

Ingredients: Bitters, Grapefruit juice, Light rum,
Preparation: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Ingredients: Milk, Butterscotch schnapps, Goldschlager,
Preparation: Shake over ice, strain. Serves two.

Ingredients: Cherry, Lemon, Red wine, Sugar, Lemon, Blended whiskey,
Preparation: Shake blended whiskey, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Float claret on top. Decorate with the half-slice of lemon and the cherry and serve.

Ingredients: Milk, Frangelico, Baileys irish cream,
Preparation: Serve over ice

Ingredients: Lemon-lime soda, Sour mix, Blue Curacao, Gin, Vodka, Rum,
Preparation: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

Ingredients: Milk, Vanilla extract, Sugar, Cocoa powder,
Preparation: Mix with a bit of milk (1 oz or so) in coffee mug. Nuke mug for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until the heated cocoa dissolves. Fill mug with milk. Nuke for 1-2 minutes, depending on wattage and preferences as to burnt mouth parts.

Ingredients: Light cream, Vodka, Triple sec, Amaretto, Creme de Cacao,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Dry Vermouth, Campari, Rye whiskey,
Preparation: Chill cocktail glass. Add ingredients to a mixing glass, and fill 2/3 full with ice. Stir about 20 seconds. Empty cocktail glass and strain into the glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Ingredients: Soda water, Sugar syrup, Orange juice, Lemon juice,
Preparation: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or highball glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

Ingredients: Ice, Cream, Vodka, Rum, Orange juice,
Preparation: Pour ingredients over ice and stir.

Ingredients: Ginger ale, Orange juice, Gin, Cherry brandy,
Preparation: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

Ingredients: Oreo cookie, Vanilla ice-cream, Baileys irish cream, Kahlua, Vodka,
Preparation: Blend Vodka, Kahlua, Bailey's, ice-cream and the Oreo well in a blender. Pour into a large frosted glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

Ingredients: Goldschlager, Jagermeister, Butterscotch schnapps, Baileys irish cream, Kahlua,
Preparation:
Just mix it all together.
It's meant to be a shot, but it works just fine as a proper adult-sized drink over lots of ice.

Tastes like an oatmeal cookie.

Ingredients: Sour mix, Orange juice, Grenadine, Spiced rum,
Preparation: Combine liquors in a blender. Add a half scoop of ice and blend. Garnish with an orange and cherry flag. So good it will melt in your mouth!!!

Ingredients: Orange Peel, Rosemary, Soda Water, Rosemary Syrup, Lemon Juice, Orange Juice, Gin,
Preparation: Add the spirits to the bottom of the glass and top equally with the mixer drinks. Garnish with orange slices inside the glass as well as some rosemary on top.

Ingredients: Nutmeg, Espresso, Orange peel, Chocolate, Milk,
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in heavy medium saucepan. Stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Increase heat and bring just to a boil, stirring often. Remove from heat and whisk untily frothy. Return to heat and bring to boil again. Remove from heat, whisk until frothy. Repeat heating and whisking once again. Discard orange peel. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Let stand at room temperature. Before serving, bring just to boil, remove from heat and whisk until frothy.) Pour hot chocolate into coffee mugs. Makes 2 servings.

Ingredients: Ice, Lemonade, Beer, Whiskey,
Preparation: Add ingredients and mix in blender.

Ingredients: Orange Juice, Apricot Brandy, Gin,
Preparation: Shake together over ice. Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

Ingredients: Gin, Bitters,
Preparation: Pour the bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.

Ingredients: Orange Bitters, Angostura Bitters, Lime Juice, Orange Curacao, Gin,
Preparation: Shake, strain, up, cocktail glass

Ingredients: Egg white, Light cream, Grenadine, Gin,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Blackberries, Lime Juice, Elderflower cordial, Coconut Liqueur, Gin,
Preparation: Slowly shake in a shaker with ice, strain into a square whiskey glass. Top with fresh ice. Add the blackberries to garnish. Add flowers and a green leaf for a special look!

Ingredients: Islay single malt Scotch, Ginger Syrup, Honey syrup, Lemon Juice, Blended Scotch,
Preparation: Shake blended Scotch, lemon juice, honey syrup and ginger syrup with ice. Strain over large ice in chilled rocks glass. Float smoky Scotch on top (be sure to use a smoky Scotch such as an Islay single malt). Garnish with candied ginger.

Ingredients: Egg Yolk, Port, Brandy,
Preparation: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

Ingredients: Pineapple, Coconut milk, Light rum,
Preparation: Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

Ingredients: Cranberry juice, Orange juice, Peach schnapps, Vodka, Everclear,
Preparation: mix all ingredients into bowl keep iced stir frequently

Ingredients: Mint, Peach Bitters, Passion fruit syrup, Lime Juice, Passoa, Rum,
Preparation: Mix up all ingredients with a cocktail stirrer and serve with crushed ice with mint and edible flour if available.

Ingredients: Orange juice, Cranberry juice, Cherry liqueur, Vodka,
Preparation: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped cherry (can add more popped cherries if in the mood)!

Ingredients: Creme de Cacao, Gin,
Preparation: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Nutmeg, Egg, Powdered sugar, Light cream, Port,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Ingredients: Pineapple juice, Orange juice, Orgeat syrup, Dark rum,
Preparation: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, "on top". Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

Ingredients: Pepper, Lime, Pineapple Juice, Fresh Lime Juice, Grapefruit Juice, Tequila,
Preparation:
Rub the rim of each glass with lime slice and dip into salt.
Add ice, tequila, grapefruit juice, lime juice and top with pineapple soda.
Give it a quick stir.
Garnish with fresh pineapple or lime.

Ingredients: Prosecco, Lime, Passion fruit juice, Passoa, Vodka,
Preparation: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Cut passion fruit in half and use as garnish. Pour prosecco into a chilled shot glass and serve alongside the martini.

Ingredients: Angostura Bitters, Sugar Syrup, Grenadine, Pineapple Juice, Orange Juice, Dark Rum,
Preparation: Squeeze an orange and strain the juice. Put all the ingredients in a shaker filled with ice and shake for at least 12 seconds. Strain into a highball glass and decorate with a pineapple wedge or fruit of your choice.

Ingredients: Green Creme de Menthe, Grenadine,
Preparation: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that creme de menthe floats on grenadine. Serve without mixing.

Ingredients: Brandy, Port,
Preparation: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Ice, Pineapple juice, Apple juice, Orange juice,
Preparation: Shake with ice.

Ingredients: Vodka, Pink lemonade, Sprite,
Preparation: Shake well

Ingredients: Passion fruit juice, Sugar Syrup, Vodka,
Preparation: Pour all ingredients into a glass and stir. Garnish with half a passion fruit piece.

Ingredients: Pineapple, Ginger,
Preparation: Throw everything into a blender and liquify.

Ingredients: Nutmeg, Light cream, Kahlua, Dark rum,
Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

Ingredients: Sherry, Lime vodka, Coffee brandy,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Baileys irish cream, Midori melon liqueur, Kahlua,
Preparation: In a shot glass add 1/3 Kahlua first. Then 1/3 Miduri, topping it off with a 1/3 bailey's irish cream

Ingredients: Orange juice, Black Sambuca,
Preparation: Simply add the orange juice, quite a quick pour in order to mix the sambucca with the orange juice. The juice MUST have fruit pulp!

Ingredients: Lemon-lime soda, Grenadine, Red wine,
Preparation: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

Ingredients: Benedictine, Gin, Dry Vermouth,
Preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Raspberry syrup, Lemon, Brandy, Light rum,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Lime, Sherry, Light rum,
Preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Powdered sugar, Grenadine, Lemon juice, Apricot brandy, Gin, Dry Vermouth,
Preparation: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass. Garnish and serve.

Ingredients: 7-Up, Beer,
Preparation: Pour beer into large mug, slowly add the 7-up (or Sprite).

Ingredients: Maraschino cherry, Orange, Sugar, Lemon juice, Light rum,
Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with the orange slice and the cherry.

Ingredients: Ice, Orange juice, Fruit punch, Ginger ale, Rum,
Preparation: Mix all ingredients in a punch bowl and serve.

Ingredients: Water, Lemon peel, Powdered sugar, Rum,
Preparation: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add rum and one ice cube and stir. Add the twist of lemon peel and serve.

Ingredients: Coca-Cola, Egg, Sweet and sour, Gin,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

Ingredients: Lemon, Lemon-lime soda, Rum,
Preparation: Pour the rum and soda into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

Ingredients: Cranberry juice, Pineapple juice, Orange juice, Blackberry brandy, Malibu rum,
Preparation: Mix all ingredients in glass & add ice.

Ingredients: Lemon peel, Drambuie, Scotch,
Preparation: Pour the Scotch and Drambuie into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Ingredients: Cranberry juice, Amaretto, Crown Royal,
Preparation: One shot each, shake n shoot

Ingredients: Crown Royal, Frangelico,
Preparation: Into a shot glass layer the Crown Royal on top of the Frangelico.

Ingredients: Cranberry juice, Chambord raspberry liqueur, Peach schnapps, Crown Royal,
Preparation: Pour all the ingredients into tumbler over ice. Strain into glass.

Ingredients: Orange, Maraschino cherry, Dark rum, Lemon, Club soda, Sugar,
Preparation: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the club soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with the cherry and the orange and lemon slices.

Ingredients: Ginger ale, Lemon juice, Sugar syrup,
Preparation: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with ginger ale.

Ingredients: Rosemary, Tonic Water, Blue Curacao, Gin,
Preparation:
1) Add the Bombay Sapphire, Blue Curacao, rosemary sprig and gently squeezed lemon wedge to a balloon glass. Swirl well to combine.
2) Fill with cubed ice and top with the Fever-Tree Light Tonic Water.
3) Gently fold with a bar spoon to mix.

Ingredients: Soda Water, Vanilla extract, Egg White, Cream, Sugar Syrup, Lemon Juice, Gin,
Preparation:
Prepare all the ingredients on the counter to be able to work well and quickly, especially the cream and egg white.

Pour all the ingredients into a shaker.

Shake vigorously for 1 minute: cream and egg white must be mixed perfectly, so don't rush.

Now open the shaker and put some ice and shake for 1-2 minutes. It depends on how long you can resist!

Pour into a highball glass, add a splash of soda and garnish to taste.

Ramos Gin Fizz was once drunk as an invigorating drink or even as a breakfast, try it as an aperitif and after dinner and you will discover a little gem now lost.

Ingredients: Carbonated water, Egg, Powdered sugar, Lemon, Gin,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Ingredients: Nutmeg, Powdered sugar, Milk, Light rum,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Ingredients: Mint, Raspberry syrup, Bourbon,
Preparation: Softly muddle the mint leaves and raspberry syrup in the bottom of the cup. Add crushed ice and Bourbon to the cup and then stir. Top with more ice, garnish with a mint sprig.

Ingredients: Orange juice, Light rum,
Preparation: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

Ingredients: Ice, Lemon-lime soda, Raspberry vodka,
Preparation: Pour the raspberry vodka and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Ingredients: Lime peel, Water, Bitters, Powdered sugar, rum, Light rum,
Preparation: Stir powdered sugar, water, and bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and light rum. Add the twist of lime peel, float 151 proof rum on top, and serve.

Ingredients: Lemon Juice, Sugar Syrup, Creme de Cassis, Vodka,
Preparation: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Ingredients: Malibu rum, Midori melon liqueur, Chambord raspberry liqueur, Triple sec, Gin, Tequila, Vodka, Rum,
Preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a very tall glass. Sip cautiously.

Ingredients: Orange juice, Pepsi Cola, Peach schnapps, Red wine,
Preparation: Throw it all together and serve real cold.

Ingredients: Soda Water, Campari, Prosecco,
Preparation: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Ingredients: Light cream, Amaretto, Brandy,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Cinnamon, Cloves, Lemon juice, Orange juice, Sugar, Red wine,
Preparation: Mix all together in a pitcher and refrigerate. Add cloves and cinnamon sticks to taste. Serve in wine glasses.

Ingredients: Orange Peel, Angostura Bitters, Blood Orange, Ruby Port, Amaro Montenegro, Vodka,
Preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice. Express orange peel over drink and garnish.

Ingredients: Orange spiral, Champagne, Lime Juice, Rum, Allspice, Sugar,
Preparation:
Gently warm 60g golden caster sugar in a pan with 30ml water and 1 tbsp allspice. Cook gently until the sugar has dissolved, then leave the mixture to cool. Strain through a sieve lined with a coffee filter (or a double layer of kitchen paper).

Pour 60ml of the spiced syrup into a cocktail shaker along with 200ml rum and 90ml lime juice. Shake with ice and strain between six flute glasses. Top up with 600ml champagne and garnish each with an orange twist.

Ingredients: Ice, Lemon, Lemonade, Advocaat,
Preparation: Place one ice cube in the glass and add 1 1/2 oz of Advocaat. Fill up the glass with lemonade and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve at once.

Ingredients: Wild Turkey, Jack Daniels, Jim Beam,
Preparation: Pour one part Jack Daneils and one part Jim Beam into shot glass then float Wild Turkey on top.

Ingredients: Salt, Gin, Grapefruit juice,
Preparation: Pour all ingredients over ice cubes in a highball glass. Stir well and serve. (Vodka may be substituted for gin, if preferred.)

Ingredients: Sweet and sour, Orange juice, Apricot brandy,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled whiskey sour glass, and serve.

Ingredients: Grapefruit juice, Cranberry juice, Vodka,
Preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Ingredients: Cherry, Lemon, Powdered sugar, Lime, Scotch,
Preparation: Shake scotch, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Decorate with 1/2 slice lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

Ingredients: Milk, Godiva liqueur,
Preparation: Put 2 shots Godiva Liquour into a glass, add as much or as little milk as you would like.

Ingredients: Orange juice, Vodka,
Preparation: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

Ingredients: Nutmeg, Egg, Powdered sugar, Light cream, Sherry,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Ingredients: Anisette, Brandy,
Preparation: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is "Sun and Shade", and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

Ingredients: Orange juice, Grenadine, Creme de Banane, Vodka,
Preparation: Take a tall glass and put in a few ice cubes, fill the vodka over it and fill with juice then the "creme", to end fill in the grenadine but very carefully at the side of the glass so it will lay down in the bottom. garnish with orange and strawberry.

Ingredients: Cherries, Grenadine, Orange juice, Pineapple juice, Malibu rum, rum,
Preparation: Fill glass with ice and add shots of Bacardi and Malibu. Add splash of pineapple juice and top with orange juice. Add grenadine for color and garnish with cherries.

Ingredients: Nutmeg, Milk, Egg, Powdered sugar, Sherry,
Preparation: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Ingredients: Honey, Banana, Milk,
Preparation: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Ingredients: Fresca, Lemon, Lime, Orange, Apple, Water, Sugar, Red wine,
Preparation: Dissolve the sugar in hot water and cool. Peel the citrus fruits and break into wedges. Mix the wine, sugar syrup, fruit, and Fresca in a pitcher and put in the fridge for a few hours. Serve in tall glasses with a straw.

Ingredients: Orange juice, Wine, Scotch,
Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Ingredients: Lime Juice, Pineapple Juice, Creme De Banane, Campari, Dark Rum,
Preparation: Mix together the alcoholic portions and top with Pineapple and Lime juice.

Ingredients: Vanilla extract, Rum, Coffee, Brown sugar, Water,
Preparation: Boil water, sugar and coffe for 10 mins and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

Ingredients: Green Chartreuse, Sweet Vermouth, Irish Whiskey,
Preparation: Stir over ice. Strain into chilled glass. Cut a wide swath of orange peel, and express the orange oils over the drink. Discard orange twist.

Ingredients: Pineapple juice, Amaretto, Wild Turkey,
Preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Ingredients: Cream, rum, Amaretto, Irish cream, Kahlua,
Preparation: Blend with Ice until smooth. Serve in a tulip glass, top with whip cream.

Ingredients: Ice, Whipping cream, Sugar, Cardamom, Coriander, Coffee,
Preparation: Place the coffee and spices in the filter cone of your coffee maker. Brew coffee as usual, let it cool. In a tall glass, dissolve 1 or 2 teaspoons of sugar in an ounce of the coffee (it's easier to dissolve than if you put it right over ice). Add 5-6 ice cubes and pour coffee to within about 1 inch of the top of the glass. Rest a spoon on top of the coffee and slowly pour whipping cream into the spoon. This will make the cream float on top of the coffee rather than dispersing into it right away.

Ingredients: Orange, Maraschino cherry, Club soda, Sugar, Lemon juice, Gin,
Preparation: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass alomst filled with ice cubes. Add the club soda. Stir and garnish with the cherry and the orange slice.

Ingredients: Celery salt, Lemon juice, Tomato juice,
Preparation: Place all ingredients in the blender jar - cover and whiz on medium speed until well blended. Pour in one tall, 2 medium or 3 small glasses and drink up.

Ingredients: Coffee, Grand Marnier,
Preparation: Add your GM and then add your coffee.

Ingredients: Whipped cream, Amaretto, Jack Daniels, Coffee,
Preparation: Mix Coffee, Jack Daniels and Amaretto. Add Cream on top.

Ingredients: Ginger ale, Egg white, Grenadine, Lemon juice, Tequila,
Preparation: Shake all ingredients (except ginger ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with ginger ale, stir, and serve.

Ingredients: Cherry, Lemon, Powdered sugar, Lemon, Tequila,
Preparation: Shake tequila, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a whiskey sour glass. Add the half-slice of lemon, top with the cherry, and serve.

Ingredients: Mint, Ice, Condensed milk, Water, Tea,
Preparation: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

Ingredients: Lime Juice, Maraschino Liqueur, Green Chartreuse,
Preparation: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Ingredients: Orange peel, Bitters, Anis, Gin, Dry Vermouth,
Preparation: Stir all ingredients (except orange peel) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of orange peel and serve.

Ingredients: Mint, Ginger, Lime, Tonic Water, Rosso Vermouth, Elderflower cordial, Gin,
Preparation:
1) Squeeze two lime wedges into a balloon glass then add the cordial, Bombay Sapphire and MARTINI Rosso Vermouth, swirl to mix.

2) Fully fill the glass with cubed ice and stir to chill.

3) Top with Fever-Tree Ginger Ale and gently stir again to combine.

Preparation: Vampiros may be made in a tall glass or an old fashioned glass. Bartenders may first "rim" the glass with Kosher Salt, which is done by placing a layer of Kosher Salt on a chopping board, moistening the glass' rim with lime juice or water, and then placing the upside down glass rim onto the Kosher Salt, so that the salt sticks to the moistened rim. The second step is to fill half the glass with ice and add one or two shooter glasses full of high quality Tequila. The next stage is to add the flavouring elements. This is done by squeezing a fresh lime into the glass, adding a few grains of salt, adding citrus-flavoured soda pop, until the glass is 4/5 full, and then adding spicy Viuda de Sanchez (or orange juice, lime juice and pico de gallo). The final step is to stir the ingredients so that the flavours are properly blended.
